Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<Lieutenant Angelo is actually more afraid of Italy itself finding out. To us, our homeland's current government is a mere puppet set up by the Allied Forces. If they find out, the gold will be returned to them. However, that would be the same as handing the gold over to our enemies.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<Ensign Angelo is actually more afraid of Italy itself finding out. To us, our homeland's current government is a mere puppet set up by the Allied Forces. If they find out, the gold will be returned to them. However, that would be the same as handing the gold over to our enemies.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 『少尉はむしろ、イタリア本国に知られることを恐れているわ。私たちにとって、今の祖国は連合国の傀儡政権。彼らに知られれば、黄金は返還することになる。しかしそれは、私たちの敵に黄金を渡すようなもの。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『少尉はむしろ、イタリア本国に知られることを恐れているわ。私たちにとって、今の祖国は連合国の傀儡政権。彼らに知られれば、黄金は返還することになる。しかしそれは、私たちの敵に黄金を渡すようなもの』
Russian (RU): "<На самом деле прапорщик Анджело больше боится, что прознает сама Италия. Для нас нынешнее правительство нашей родины лишь марионетка союзных сил. Если они узнают, золото нужно будет вернуть. Но это то же самое, что вручить его нашим врагам.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹O subtenente Angelo tem mais medo que a própria Itália descubra. Para nós, o governo atual da nossa pátria é um mero fantoche das Forças Aliadas. Se eles descobrirem, o ouro vai retornar. Mas isso seria o mesmo que entregar o ouro nas mãos do inimigo.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『少尉反而是怕被意大利本國知道。對我們來說，現在的祖國是盟軍的傀儡政權。要是被他們知道了，黃金就將被返還。但這種返還，就像是把黃金交給我們的敵人一樣。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『少尉反而是怕被意大利本国知道。对我们来说，现在的祖国是盟军的傀儡政权。要是被他们知道了，黄金就将被返还。但这种返还，就像是把黄金交给我们的敌人一样。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}In realtà, l'alfiere Angelo teme maggiormente che sia l'Italia a trovarlo. Secondo noi, l'attuale governo della nostra madrepatria è solo un burattino disposto dagli alleati. Se scoprono l'oro, gli verrà restituito. Tuttavia, significherebbe consegnare l'oro ai nostri nemici. {p:0:＞}"

Steam (ST): They'd come all this way to make sure that the gold didn't fall into enemy hands.
Umineko Project (UP): They had come all this way to make sure that the gold didn't fall into enemy hands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 敵の手に黄金を渡さないために、彼らはここまでやって来たのだ。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles tiveram todo esse trabalho para ter certeza que o ouro não iria cair nas mãos dos inimigos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為了不把黃金交予敵手，他們不遠萬里地來到了此處。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为了不把黄金交予敌手，他们不远万里地来到了此处。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Erano venuti sin qui per assicurarsi che l'oro non cadesse nelle mani nemiche.

Steam (ST): They needed to hide it from that puppet government... ...until their homeland could be truly restored...
Umineko Project (UP): They needed to hide this gold from the puppet government......until their homeland could be truly restored...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They needed to hide this gold from the puppet government until their homeland could be truly restored...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Precisavam esconder esse ouro do governo fantoche......até que a pátria deles possa ser realmente restaurada...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在他們真正祖國復興之日的到來之前，必須遠離傀儡祖國的魔掌，好好藏起這筆黃金…。

Steam (ST): "Ushiromiya, make a proposal to the Italians. Tell them that we wish to offer our assistance."

Steam (ST): "Let's see if I've got this straight. They want that gold kept secret, so their homeland doesn't find out about it. But they'll need to find at least a transport ship if they plan to carry it off this island. If they try that though, the mainland will hear about it, which means the Italian government will too."
Umineko Project (UP): "I understand what the Italians are trying to say. They want that gold to be hidden so that their homeland doesn't find out about it. However, they would need to obtain at least a transport ship if they plan to take it from this island. If they tried that, however, the mainland would hear about it, which means that the Italian government would too."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「イタリア人たちの言い分はこうであろう？　彼らはその黄金を、祖国に知られることなく隠したいわけだ。しかし、この島から運び出そうとすれば、輸送船を手配せねばならなくなる。そうすれば、本土に知られ、さらにはイタリア本国にも知られることとなる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「イタリア人たちの言い分はこうであろう？　彼らはその黄金を、祖国に知られることなく隠したいわけだ。しかし、この島から運び出そうとすれば、輸送船を手配せねばならなくなる。そうすれば、本土に知られ、さらにはイタリア本国にも知られることとなる」
Russian (RU): "Я понимаю, что итальянцы имеют в виду. Они хотят спрятать золото, чтобы их родина не узнала о нём. Но если они запланируют увезти его с острова, им потребуется транспортное судно. В этом случае материк узнает о золоте, а значит, и итальянское правительство."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu entendo o que os italianos estão tentando. Eles querem que o ouro seja escondido para que a pátria deles não o encontre. Mas precisariam de um transporte marítimo se planejam levá‐lo embora desta ilha. Se tentarem isso, contudo, nosso país ficaria sabendo, o que significa que a pátria italiana também saberia."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「那幫意大利人的主張是這樣吧？他們想不被祖國知道地藏起這筆黃金。可是，如要將黃金運出這個島，那就必須得去準備運輸船。而這麼做，會被本土知道，還會被意大利本國知道。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「那帮意大利人的主张是这样吧？他们想不被祖国知道地藏起这笔黄金。可是，如要将黄金运出这个岛，那就必须得去准备运输船。而这么做，会被本土知道，还会被意大利本国知道。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Capisco ciò che gli italiani stanno cercando di dire. Vogliono che quell'oro venga nascosto così che la madrepatria non lo scopra. Tuttavia, avrebbero almeno bisogno di una nave da carico se hanno intenzione di prenderlo da quest'isola. Ma se ci provassero, la madrepatria lo scoprirebbe, così come il governo italiano."

Steam (ST): Later on, several plausible rumors would circulate... ...about how Nazi Germany also moved much of its secret wealth to certain hidden areas in South America just prior to its collapse. It was a very natural conclusion to reach.
Umineko Project (UP): Later on, several plausible rumors would circulate...about how Germany also moved much of its secret wealth to certain hidden areas in South America just prior to its surrender. It was a very natural conclusion to reach.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Later on, several plausible rumors would circulate about how Nazi Germany also moved much of its secret wealth to certain hidden areas in South America just prior to its collapse. It was a very natural conclusion to reach.
PC Japanese (JP): ナチスドイツも、降伏直前にその隠し財産を、南米などの某所に極秘で運搬して隠した、などという噂がまことしやかに流れる。それは妥当な想像だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ドイツでも、降伏直前にその隠し財産を、南米などの某所に極秘で運搬して隠した、などという噂がまことしやかに流れる。それは妥当な想像だった。
Russian (RU): Позже поползло несколько правдоподобных слухов... о том, как нацистская Германия незадолго до распада тоже перевезла большую часть своих секретных богатств в определённые скрытые области в Южной Америке. Так что это было вполне естественно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Posteriormente, diversos rumores plausíveis iriam circular...sobre como a Alemanha também transportou riquezas secretas para áreas ocultas na América do Sul pouco antes de sua rendição. Uma conclusão natural de se chegar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 德國在臨近投降前把他們的地下財產極端保密地運到了南美等地的某處，這種傳聞也是煞有介事地流傳著的。這是妥當的想法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 德国在临近投降前把他们的地下财产极端保密地运到了南美等地的某处，这种传闻也是煞有介事地流传着的。这是妥当的想法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In seguito, sarebbero circolate diverse dicerie di come anche la Germania nazista avesse trasferito molte delle sue risorse segrete in certe aree nascoste del Sud America poco prima del suo collasso. Era una conclusione molto facile da raggiungere.

Steam (ST): That submarine was their only method of transporting the gold in secrecy, and it's become completely useless. They can't fully stop the water from seeping in, and it'll probably sink completely before much longer.
Umineko Project (UP): That submarine was their only method of transporting the gold in secrecy, and it's become completely useless. They can't fully stop the water from seeping in, and it'll probably sink completely before much longer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That submarine was their only method of transporting the gold in secrecy, and it's become completely useless. They can't fully stop the water from seeping in, and it'll probably sink completely before much longer.
PC Japanese (JP): 唯一の極秘輸送手段であった潜水艦は完全に航行不能で、浸水は止められず、近い内に完全に沈没するだろう。
Russian (RU): Эта субмарина была их единственным способом перевозить золото в секретности, и она стала совершенно непригодна. Они не могут полностью остановить просачивающуюся воду, и вскоре она окончательно затонет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esse submarino era o único método de transportar o ouro em segredo que eles tinham, e agora ele se tornou completamente inútil. Eles não vão conseguir impedir a água de infiltrar, e provavelmente vai afundar completamente em pouco tempo.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "The Rokkenjima base is top-secret, and no one knows about it. The islanders in the surrounding area believe this island to be ill-omened and deserted, so they never come near it. ......Do you get my meaning, Ushiromiya?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「この六軒島基地は、誰も知らぬ秘密基地だ。近隣の島民たちは、この島を不吉な無人島と信じて近寄りもしない。……言っている意味がわかるか、右代宮。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「この六軒島基地は、誰も知らぬ秘密基地だ。近隣の島民たちは、この島を不吉な無人島と信じて近寄りもしない。……言っている意味がわかるか、右代宮」
Russian (RU): "База Роккенджимы сверхсекретна, и о ней никто не знает. Жители окрестных островов считают этот остров зловещим и безлюдным, поэтому никогда не приближаются к нему. ......Ты меня понимаешь, Уширомия?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A base de Rokkenjima é ultrassecreta e ninguém sabe sobre ela. Os ilhéus dos arredores acreditam que esta ilha é amaldiçoada e deserta, por isso nunca se aproximam dela. ......Capitou, Ushiromiya?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這個六軒島基地，是無人知曉的秘密基地。而近鄰的漁民們，深信這個島是不吉利的無人島，連靠近都不敢靠近。……你可知我這話的意思，右代宮？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这个六轩岛基地，是无人知晓的秘密基地。而近邻的渔民们，深信这个岛是不吉利的无人岛，连靠近都不敢靠近。……你可知我这话的意思，右代宫？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "La base di Rokkenjima è top-secret, nessuno ne è a conoscenza. Gli abitanti delle isole vicine credono che sia nefasta e deserta, perciò non si avvicinano. Capisci che intendo, Ushiromiya?"

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<What did he say?>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<What did he say?>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 『彼は何と？』
Russian (RU): "<Что он сказал?>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹O que ele disse?›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『他講了什麼？』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『他讲了什么？』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Cosa ha detto?{p:0:＞}"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "<As we told you earlier, no one knows about this base. And, as you can see, it's of no use strategically, so the higher-ups have already forgotten about it. ...It sounds like Lieutenant Yamamoto's suggesting that you hide the gold on this island.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<As we told you earlier, no one knows about this base. And, as you can see, it's of no use strategically, so the higher‐ups have already forgotten about it. ......Sounds like Lieutenant Yamamoto's suggesting that you hide the gold on this island.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "<As we told you earlier, no one knows about this base. And, as you can see, it's of no use strategically, so the higher-ups have already forgotten about it. ......Sounds like Lieutenant Yamamoto's suggesting that you hide the gold on this island.>"
PC Japanese (JP): 『前にも話した通り、この六軒島基地は誰にも知られていない。見ての通り、戦略価値は何もなく、上層部にもすでに忘れられてる。……中尉は、この島に黄金を隠してはどうかと提案したいみたいだ。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『前にも話した通り、この六軒島基地は誰にも知られていない。見ての通り、戦略価値は何もなく、上層部にもすでに忘れられてる。……中尉は、この島に黄金を隠してはどうかと提案したいみたいだ』
Russian (RU): "<Как мы говорили вам, об этой базе никто не знает. И, как видишь, стратегически она не используется, поэтому начальство про неё уже забыло. ......Звучит так, словно лейтенант Ямамото предлагает вам скрыть золото на этом острове.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Como dissemos antes, ninguém sabe sobre esta base. E, como pode ver, ela não tem nenhum uso estratégico, por isso os oficiais já esqueceram dela. ......Parece que o tenente Yamamoto está sugerindo que vocês escondam o ouro aqui.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『就跟以前說過的一樣，這個六軒島基地誰都不知道。一如你所見，它毫無戰略價值，也已被上頭遺忘。……中尉好像是在提議，就把黃金藏在這個島上怎麼樣？』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『就跟以前说过的一样，这个六轩岛基地谁都不知道。一如你所见，它毫无战略价值，也已被上头遗忘。……中尉好像是在提议，就把黄金藏在这个岛上怎么样？』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Come vi abbiamo detto prima, nessuno sa di questa base. E, come potete vedere, non ha uno scopo strategico, perciò gli ufficiali se ne sono già dimenticati. ... Sembra che il tenente Yamamoto stia suggerendo di nascondere l'oro in quest'isola. {p:0:＞}"

Steam (ST): Beatrice quickly translated this and told Lieutenant Angelo.
Umineko Project (UP): Beatrice quickly translated this and told Ensign Angelo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェはすぐにそれを翻訳し、アンジェロ少尉に伝える。
Russian (RU): Беатриче тут же перевела и сказала прапорщику Анджело.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beatrice rapidamente traduziu a conversa para o subtenente Angelo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵莉切立即就將這話翻譯，說給了安杰洛少尉聽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵莉切立即就将这话翻译，说给了安杰洛少尉听。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beatrice tradusse ciò alla svelta, riferendolo all'alfiere Angelo.

Steam (ST): He began discussing something rapidly with his subordinates.
Umineko Project (UP): The ensign began discussing rapidly with his subordinates.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The ensign began discussing rapidly with his subordinates.
PC Japanese (JP): 少尉は下士官たちと早口に議論を始める。
Russian (RU): Он начал быстрое обсуждение со своими подчинёнными.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O subtenente começou rapidamente a discutir com seus subordinados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 少尉與下屬士官們話講得很快地展開了激烈討論。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 少尉与下属士官们话讲得很快地展开了激烈讨论。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'alfiere iniziò a discuterne rapidamente con i suoi subordinati.

Steam (ST): They didn't look happy.
Umineko Project (UP): They didn't look happy.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They didn't look happy.
PC Japanese (JP): 表情は苦々しい。
Russian (RU): Они были не в восторге.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles não pareciam contentes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們的表情頗顯困窘。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们的表情颇显困窘。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non sembravano felici.

Steam (ST): Japan may have been their ally, but they probably didn't want to leave the gold for reconstructing their motherland in Asian hands.
Umineko Project (UP): Japan may have been their ally, but they probably didn't want the gold for reconstructing their motherland to be entrusted to Asians.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Japan may have been their ally, but they probably didn't want the gold for reconstructing their motherland to be entrusted to Asians.
PC Japanese (JP): 同盟国とはいえ、祖国再建の大切な黄金を、東洋人の手に委ねたくはないのだろう。
Russian (RU): Даже если Япония была их союзником, они не хотели доверять азиатам золото для восстановления своей родины.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Japão podia ser um aliado, mas eles provavelmente não queriam confiar aos asiáticos o ouro que reconstruiria a pátria deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說是同盟國，但他們可並不想把重建祖國的重要的黃金交予東洋人之手。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说是同盟国，但他们可并不想把重建祖国的重要的黄金交予东洋人之手。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il Giappone poteva essere anche loro alleato, ma probabilmente non volevano che l'oro per ricostruire la propria madrepatria venisse affidato agli asiatici.

Steam (ST): Still, it was hard to imagine any other option for them.
Umineko Project (UP): Still, it's hard to imagine any other option for them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Still, it's hard to imagine any other option for them.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、選択の余地が残されているとは思えない。
Russian (RU): И всё же, для них было трудно представить другой вариант.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda assim, é difícil imaginar qualquer outra opção para eles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，已經怎麼都不覺得還有選擇的餘地了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，已经怎么都不觉得还有选择的余地了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, è difficile immaginare un'altra opzione per loro.

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<...It's a fierce debate. Some say that there's no other option, while others think we should remain loyal to our homeland no matter the cost. ...Lieutenant Angelo is stuck between a rock and a hard place.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<......It's a fierce debate. Some say that there's no other option, while others think we should remain loyal to our homeland no matter the cost. ......Ensign Angelo is stuck between a rock and a hard place.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 『……激しく議論しているわ。他に手はないと言う者もいるし、それでも祖国に忠誠を尽くすべきだと言う者もいる。……少尉は板挟みになってるわ。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『……激しく議論しているわ。他に手はないと言う者もいるし、それでも祖国に忠誠を尽くすべきだと言う者もいる。……少尉は板挟みになってるわ』
Russian (RU): "<......Напряжённый спор. Одни говорят, что другого выхода нет, а другие считают, что мы должны оставаться верными своей родине независимо от цены. ......Прапорщик Анджело застрял между молотом и наковальней.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹......É um debate acirrado. Alguns dizem que não há outra opção, enquanto outros acreditam que devemos permanecer leais à nossa pátria, não importa o que isso possa custar. ......O subtenente Angelo está preso em um dilema.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『……他們在激烈討論。有的人說，沒別的辦法了，也有的人說，哪怕這樣也得向祖國盡忠。……少尉被兩邊夾在中間。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『……他们在激烈讨论。有的人说，没别的办法了，也有的人说，哪怕这样也得向祖国尽忠。……少尉被两边夹在中间。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}... C'è una discussione intensa. Qualcuno dice che non c'è altra scelta, mentre altri pensano che dovremmo rimanere fedeli alla nostra madrepatria, a qualunque costo. ... L'alfiere Angelo si trova tra l'incudine e il martello. {p:0:＞}"

Steam (ST): The final order given to them by their fallen homeland was to hide the gold. However, by now, there was no way for that order to be carried out successfully.
Umineko Project (UP): Hiding this gold was the final order given to them by their fallen homeland.{n}However, by now, there was no way for that order to be carried out successfully.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The final order given to them by their fallen homeland was to hide the gold. However, by now, there was no way for that order to be carried out successfully.
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金隠匿は、滅んだ祖国の最後の命令だ。しかしその命令はもはや遂行不能だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 黄金隠匿は、滅んだ祖国の最後の命令だ。{n}しかしその命令はもはや遂行不能だ。
Russian (RU): Спрятать золото — последний приказ, отданный им их павшей родиной.{n}Но сейчас не было возможности успешно выполнить его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Esconder o ouro foi a última ordem dada a eles por sua pátria caída.{n}Entretanto, agora, não havia mais como acatar essa ordem até o fim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏匿黃金，是滅亡了的祖國的，最後的命令。{n}然而，這個命令已經無法履行。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏匿黄金，是灭亡了的祖国的，最后的命令。{n}然而，这个命令已经无法履行。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'ultimo ordine dato loro dalla madrepatria era quello di nascondere l'oro. Tuttavia, ora era impossibile eseguire quell'ordine con successo.

Steam (ST): If the mainland or their own homeland found out, the gold would probably be confiscated by the wrong people, from their point of view.
Umineko Project (UP): If the mainland or their own homeland found out, the gold would probably be confiscated by the wrong people, from their point of view.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If the mainland or their own homeland found out, the gold would probably be confiscated by the wrong people, from their point of view.
PC Japanese (JP): 本土や祖国に知られれば、彼らの望まぬ人間たちに接収されることになる。
Russian (RU): С их точки зрения, если материк или их родина узнает, золото могут конфисковать не те люди.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se a pátria deles, ou a nossa, descobrir sobre isso, o ouro provavelmente será confiscado pelas pessoas erradas, ao ponto de vista deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 若是被本土或祖國知道了，黃金就會被他們不願意看到的人接收。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 若是被本土或祖国知道了，黄金就会被他们不愿意看到的人接收。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se il governo della loro madrepatria lo scoprisse, probabilmente l'oro verrebbe confiscato e dato alle persone sbagliate, dal loro punto di vista.

Steam (ST): If they really wanted to carry out their homeland's orders faithfully, ...Lieutenant Yamamoto's proposal was extremely reasonable...
Umineko Project (UP): If they really wanted to carry out their homeland's orders faithfully, .........Lieutenant Yamamoto's proposal was extremely reasonable...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If they really wanted to carry out their homeland's orders faithfully, ......Lieutenant Yamamoto's proposal was extremely reasonable...
PC Japanese (JP): 彼らが祖国の命令を忠実に実行しようとするなら、………山本中尉の、この島に隠せばいいという提案は、極めて妥当なものだ…。
Russian (RU): Если они и вправду хотели честно выполнить приказ своей родины...... предложение лейтенанта Ямамото было вполне разумным...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eles realmente querem obedecer as ordens de sua pátria à risca,{n}.........a proposta do tenente Yamamoto era extremamente razoável...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們如果要忠實實行祖國的命令，………那山本中尉的“把黃金藏在這島上就行了”的提議，就可謂極其妥當…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们如果要忠实实行祖国的命令，………那山本中尉的“把黄金藏在这岛上就行了”的提议，就可谓极其妥当…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se volevano eseguire sul serio gli ordini della madrepatria con fedeltà... la proposta del tenente Yamamoto era estremamente ragionevole...

Steam (ST): Though he couldn't understand their words, he seemed to realize how divided they were.
Umineko Project (UP): Though the lieutenant couldn't understand their words, it seemed he realized how divided they were.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Though the lieutenant couldn't understand their words, it seemed he realized how divided they were.
PC Japanese (JP): たとえ言葉が理解できなくても、彼らが悩んでいることは、山本中尉にもわかっているようだった。
Russian (RU): Хотя лейтенант не понимал их слов, он понял, насколько разделились их мнения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Embora o tenente não pudesse entender as palavras deles, ele pareceu ter percebido o quão divididos os italianos estavam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看起來，哪怕聽不懂他們的話，山本中尉也明白了，他們正為此苦惱。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看起来，哪怕听不懂他们的话，山本中尉也明白了，他们正为此苦恼。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sebbene il tenente non potesse capire le loro parole, sembrava che si fosse reso conto di quanto fossero divisi.

Steam (ST): "Heheheh, if we help out, we'll be able to hide the gold in total secrecy. Fortunately, there's an abandoned tunnel that stretches all the way across this island."
Umineko Project (UP): "Heheheh, if we help out, we'll be able to hide the gold in the utmost secrecy. Fortunately, there's an abandoned tunnel that stretches all the way across this island."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「くっくっく、我々が協力すれば、あの黄金を厳重に隠すことが出来るぞ。幸いなことに、廃棄された地下壕が長々と、この島の地下を横断している。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「くっくっく、我々が協力すれば、あの黄金を厳重に隠すことが出来るぞ。幸いなことに、廃棄された地下壕が長々と、この島の地下を横断している」
Russian (RU): "Хе‐хе‐хе, с нашей помощью можно спрятать золото в строжайшей секретности. К счастью, через весь остров тянется заброшенный туннель."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Heheheh, se ajudarmos, seremos capazes de esconder o ouro em absoluto segredo. Felizmente, existe um túnel abandonado que se estende através da ilha."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呵呵呵，只要我們伸以援手，就可以密不透風地把這筆黃金藏好。走運的是，遭到廢棄的地下戰壕，長長地橫穿了這個島的地下空間。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呵呵呵，只要我们伸以援手，就可以密不透风地把这笔黄金藏好。走运的是，遭到废弃的地下战壕，长长地横穿了这个岛的地下空间。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Heheheh, se vi diamo una mano, riusciremo a nascondere l'oro in assoluta segretezza. Fortunatamente, c'è un tunnel abbandonato che si estende per tutta l'isola."

Steam (ST): "<...He's saying that, if you hide the gold underground and bury it on this island, no one will be able to find it.>"

Umineko Project (UP): "......It seems they're having difficulty coming to a decision."

Steam (ST): "Heheh. Do you really have a choice, Italians? You don't think you can hide that gold without our help, do you? And I doubt you want to leave it lying around on the beach for much longer."
Umineko Project (UP): "Heheh. Do you really have a choice, Italians? You don't think you can hide that gold without our help, do you? And I doubt you want to leave it lying around on the beach for much longer."

Steam (ST): "After all, they really don't have the option of refusing. We could demand 80% if we wanted. I've lowered that to 50% as a sign of good faith.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......É claro, nós não somos os únicos com influência aqui. Se os italianos decidirem vazar informações, todo o ouro provavelmente seria tomado pelo Japão ou pela Itália. Não vamos lucrar um único iene com isso. Isso só vai funcionar se formos parceiros do crime."

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ovviamente, non siamo gli unici ad avere autorità. Se gli italiani decidono di rivelarlo al mondo esterno, probabilmente tutto l'oro verrà preso dal Giappone o dall'Italia. Noi non ne otterremo nemmeno uno yen. Può funzionare solamente se saremo complici nel crimine."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あのまま山積みにしていれば、やがて本土から来る迎えの連中の目に、否応なく入るだろう。そうなれば、ここにいる誰もが得をしないぞ。我々の申し出を受けて、早急に黄金を隠すべきだ」
Russian (RU): "Если они оставят эту груду как есть, её однозначно заметят, когда за ними приедет судно с материка. Это никому из нас не принесёт пользы. Они должны принять наше предложение и как можно скорее спрятать золото."

Steam (ST): The lieutenant was talking tough, but in truth, these negotiations weren't being made on an equal footing.

PC Japanese (JP): 中尉は強気に出ているが、実際は決して互角の交渉ではない。

Steam (ST): If the Italians had just wanted the gold for themselves, there wouldn't have been much of a problem.
Umineko Project (UP): If the Italians just wanted the gold for themselves, there wouldn't be much of a problem.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If the Italians just wanted the gold for themselves, there wouldn't have been much of a problem.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se os italianos simplesmente quisessem o ouro só pra eles, eles não teriam muitos problemas.

Steam (ST): But what if... What if they were true patriots... and decided to return the gold for the purpose of reconstruction, even to the defeated puppet government of their homeland?
Umineko Project (UP): But what if...what if they really were true patriots, ......and decided that they ought to return the gold, even to the defeated puppet government of their homeland, for the purpose of reconstruction?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But what if... What if they really were true patriots, ......and decided that they would return the gold, even to the defeated puppet government of their homeland, for the purpose of reconstruction?
PC Japanese (JP): しかしもし。彼らが高潔な愛国者であり、……たとえ滅んだ傀儡の祖国であっても、再建のために黄金を返還すべきだという結論に至った場合。
Russian (RU): Но что если... Что если они истинные патриоты...... и решат с целью реконструкции вернуть золото, пусть даже побеждённому марионеточному правительству своей родины?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas, e se...e se eles fossem verdadeiros patriotas, ......e decidissem que tinham a obrigação de devolver o ouro, mesmo que fosse para o derrotado governo fantoche da pátria deles, pelo propósito da reconstrução?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是如果。他們是高潔的愛國者，……並最終得出了“哪怕那是個已經滅亡了的傀儡祖國，我們也該為其重建而返還黃金”的結論。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是如果。他们是高洁的爱国者，……并最终得出了“哪怕那是个已经灭亡了的傀儡祖国，我们也该为其重建而返还黄金”的结论。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma se... e se fossero dei veri patrioti... e decidessero di riconsegnare l'oro, persino al governo-burattino sconfitto della loro madrepatria, con lo scopo di ricostruirla?

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "<But there's one thing I don't get. ...If Lieutenant Angelo doesn't want to let anyone have the gold, he could've just let the submarine sink. Why did he have it unloaded?>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<But there's one thing I don't get. .........If Ensign Angelo doesn't want to let anyone have the gold, he could have just let the submarine sink. Why did he have it unloaded?>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "<But there's one thing I don't get. ......If Ensign Angelo doesn't want to let anyone have the gold, he could have just let the submarine sink. Why did he have it unloaded?>"
PC Japanese (JP): 『しかし疑問だ。………アンジェロ少尉が誰にも黄金を渡したくないなら、沈み行く潜水艦に任せて沈めれば良かったはず。どうして荷揚げを？』
Russian (RU): "<Но я не понимаю. ......Если прапорщик Анджело не хотел отдавать золото, можно было просто дать субмарине затонуть. Зачем он выгрузил его?>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Mas tem uma coisa que eu não entendi. .........Se o subtenente Angelo não quer deixar que ninguém fique com o ouro, ele poderia simplesmente ter deixado o submarino afundar. Por que ele descarregou?›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『不過，我有個疑問。………安杰洛少尉如果不想把黃金交給任何人的話，那麼理應只需讓黃金待在船艙裡，和潛水艇一起沉底就行了。為什麼要卸貨？』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『不过，我有个疑问。………安杰洛少尉如果不想把黄金交给任何人的话，那么理应只需让黄金待在船舱里，和潜水艇一起沉底就行了。为什么要卸货？』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Ma c'è una cosa che non capisco. ... Se l'alfiere Angelo non vuole consegnare l'oro a nessuno, avrebbe semplicemente potuto lasciar affondare il sottomarino. Perché l'ha fatto scaricare?{p:0:＞}"

Сейчас он спрашивает мнение своих подчинённых с одной стороны как солдат, а с другой — как людей с семьями, ожидающими их возвращения. ......Более пуританские солдаты пришли в ярость.>"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Heheh, certo, lasciamoli parlare fin quanto vogliono. Ma non c'è molto tempo. Se dobbiamo nasconderlo, ci vorranno tempo e sforzi. ... Decidete entro domani a mezzogiorno. È tutto, italiani!"

Eles estão resolutos em seus desejos de cumprirem seus deveres com a pátria.›"

Steam (ST): "<Even if they do, the gold will just fall into someone else's hands. ...If nothing is going to be left anyway, Lieutenant Angelo suggests that they each sneak at least one ingot back with them, and some of the others seem to agree, but... Men always get carried away at times like this. Even I can't guess what they'll do...>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<Even if they do, the gold will just fall into someone else's hands. ......If nothing is going to be left anyway, Ensign Angelo suggests that they each sneak at least one ingot back with them, and some of the others seem to agree, but...... Men always get carried away at times like this. Even I can't guess what they'll do...>"

Russian (RU): "<Даже если откажутся, золото просто попадёт в руки кого‐нибудь другого. ......Раз ничего не останется в любом случае, прапорщик Анджело предлагает каждому из них увезти с собой хотя бы один слиток, и некоторые вроде согласны, но...... В такие времена мужчины всегда увлекаются. Даже я не представляю, как они поступят...>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Mesmo que o façam, o ouro simplesmente vai cair nas mãos de alguém. ......Se não vai sobrar nada mesmo, o subtenente Angelo sugeriu que cada um deles leve consigo ao menos um lingote, e alguns parecem ter concordado, mas...... Homens sempre acabam se empolgando em horas assim. Nem mesmo eu consigo dizer o que eles vão fazer...›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『哪怕拒絕了，黃金也終歸會落入他人之手。……“既然什麼都不會留下，那麼就至少一人一塊偷偷地把黃金帶回去吧”，對少尉的這個意見，好像都要出現贊同者了……。這種時候的男人，光憑心頭一股勁可是會走錯路的。我也沒辦法了…』

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Anche se lo faranno, l'oro finirà nelle mani di qualcun altro. ... L'alfiere Angelo suggerisce che, se comunque non ne rimarrà nulla, sarebbe meglio che ognuno di loro se ne prenda almeno un lingotto, e sembra che qualcuno sia d'accordo, ma... gli uomini perdono sempre il controllo in momenti come questi. Nemmeno io posso immaginare cosa faranno... {p:0:＞}"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Lion
Steam (ST): "...I imagine the Italians had some complicated feelings about all this."
Umineko Project (UP): "......I imagine the Italians had some complicated feelings about all this."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……イタリア人たちの胸中は、複雑でしょうね」

Speaker: Willard H. Wright
Steam (ST): "In their eyes, the Italy that surrendered was probably little better than an enemy country. Letting the gold go back there would make their entire voyage meaningless."
Umineko Project (UP): "In their eyes, Italy after the surrender was probably like an enemy country. Letting the gold go back to that Italy would erase the meaning of their entire voyage."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "In their eyes, Italy that surrendered was probably like an enemy country. Letting the gold go back to that Italy would erase the meaning of their entire voyage."
PC Japanese (JP): 「彼らにとって、降伏後のイタリアは敵国同然だろう。黄金をそのイタリアに返還するのは、彼らの長い旅路を全て否定するのと同じだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「彼らにとって、降伏後のイタリアは敵国同然だろう。黄金をそのイタリアに返還するのは、彼らの長い旅路を全て否定するのと同じだ」
Russian (RU): "В их глазах капитулировавшая Италия была врагом страны. Позволить золоту вернуться в такую Италию как стереть смысл всего путешествия."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Em seus olhos, a Itália pós‐rendição provavelmente era como uma nação inimiga. Deixar o ouro retornar à Itália seria como apagar o significado de toda a viagem."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「對他們來說，投降後的意大利等同於敵國吧。把黃金還給這個意大利，等於完全否定他們那段長長的旅途。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「对他们来说，投降后的意大利等同于敌国吧。把黄金还给这个意大利，等于完全否定他们那段长长的旅途。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Per loro, l'Italia che si era arresa era come una nazione nemica. Lasciare che l'oro tornasse a quell'Italia avrebbe distrutto il significato del loro viaggio."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Lion
Steam (ST): "However, embezzling and divvying up the gold would also make their whole voyage meaningless..."
Umineko Project (UP): "However, embezzling and splitting the gold would also erase the meaning of their journey..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「しかし、黄金を着服して山分けすることも、彼らの旅路の否定になります…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「しかし、黄金を着服して山分けすることも、彼らの旅路の否定になります…」
Russian (RU): "И всё же, хищение и раздел золота тоже стирают его смысл..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Porém, desviar e dividir o ouro também seria apagar o significado da viagem..."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「可是，把黄金中饱私囊地平分，也会否定他们这段旅途…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Tuttavia, anche appropriarsi indebitamente dell'oro e spartirlo eliminerebbe il significato del loro viaggio..."

Speaker: Willard H. Wright
Steam (ST): "The country they felt obligated to serve had already fallen. That alone destroyed the significance of their journey. Not a happy story for them."
Umineko Project (UP): "The country they felt obligated to serve had already fallen. That alone destroyed the significance of their journey. Not a happy story for them."

Russian (RU): "Страна, которой они были обязаны служить, уже пала. Это само по себе уничтожило значение их путешествия. Несчастливая история."

Umineko Project (UP): "......If it's bound to be meaningless anyway, wouldn't keeping hold of even just a few ingots be better than nothing?"

Umineko Project (UP): "Sure, if you want to calculate straight‐up profit and loss. ............But men aren't like that."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Sure, if you want to calculate straight-up profit and loss. .........But men aren't like that."

Chinese Traditional (CHT): “這個貫徹，是指什麼？是叫我們把黃金藏這島上嗎？是叫我們，接受那幫東洋人的提議嗎？！”

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘E cosa vorresti dire con ‘rimanere fedeli’? Nascondendo l'oro su quest'isola? Accettando la proposta di quegli asiatici?!’

Steam (ST): "We can't trust them! Especially that Yamamoto person! We mustn't let our guards down!'
Umineko Project (UP): «We can't trust them! Especially that Yamamoto person! We must not let our guards down!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'We can't trust them! Especially that Yamamoto person! We must not let our guards down!'
PC Japanese (JP): “東洋人たちは信用できません！　特にあのヤマモトという男！　断じて油断できません！”
Russian (RU): «Им нельзя доверять! Особенно этому Ямамото! Нужно быть настороже!»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Não podemos confiar neles! Especialmente naquele Yamamoto! Não devemos baixar a guarda!»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “不可相信那幫東洋人！特別是那個叫山本的男人！斷然不可對他大意！”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “不可相信那帮东洋人！特别是那个叫山本的男人！断然不可对他大意！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Non possiamo fidarci di loro! Soprattutto di quello Yamamoto! Non dobbiamo abbassare la guardia!’

Steam (ST): "Unloading the gold and letting the Japanese see it was a huge mistake! We should've let it sink with the sub!'
Umineko Project (UP): «Unloading the gold and letting the Japanese see it was a huge mistake! We should have let it sink with the sub!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Unloading the gold and letting the Japanese see it was a huge mistake! We should have let it sink with the sub!'
PC Japanese (JP): “黄金を荷揚げして日本人たちに見られたのはやはり失敗でした！　艦と共に沈めるべきでした！”
Russian (RU): «Разгрузить золото и позволить японцам увидеть его было огромной ошибкой! Лучше бы оно затонуло вместе с субмариной!»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Foi um grande erro descarregar o ouro e deixar os japoneses vê‐lo! Deveríamos tê‐lo deixado afundar com o submarino!»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “果然失算就失算在，把黃金從潛水艇上卸下，被那幫日本人看見！就該讓黃金與潛水艇一起沉入海底！”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “果然失算就失算在，把黄金从潜水艇上卸下，被那帮日本人看见！就该让黄金与潜水艇一起沉入海底！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Scaricare l'oro e lasciare che i giapponesi lo vedessero è stato un errore madornale! Avremmo dovuto lasciarlo affondare assieme al sottomarino!’

Steam (ST): "Oh, wonderful idea, let's just sink it right inside a Japanese base! It would've been pulled up eventually. That wouldn't hide anything!'
Umineko Project (UP): «Oh, wonderful idea, let's just sink it right inside a Japanese base! It would have been pulled up eventually. That wouldn't hide anything!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Oh, wonderful idea, let's just sink it right inside a Japanese base! It would have been pulled up eventually. That wouldn't hide anything!'
PC Japanese (JP): “日本人の基地で沈めてどうする？！　やがていつかは引き上げられる。隠したことにはならない！”
Russian (RU): «Отличная идея, давайте просто потопим его прямо на японской базе! Его бы в конце концов нашли. Так мы бы ничего не скрыли!»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Oh, ótima ideia, vamos deixar afundar dentro de uma base japonesa! Eventualmente ele seria recuperado. Assim nada seria escondido!»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “沉在日本人基地裡又能怎樣？！以後總有一天會被他們撈起來。根本不算藏好了！”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “沉在日本人基地里又能怎样？！以后总有一天会被他们捞起来。根本不算藏好了！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Oh, ma che bell'idea, lasciamo che affondi proprio dentro una base giapponese! Prima o poi l'avrebbero tirato su. Non nasconderebbe nulla!’

Steam (ST): "It doesn't matter. There's no way to get the gold off this island without anyone knowing.'
Umineko Project (UP): «There's no way to get the gold off this island without anyone knowing in any case.»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'It doesn't matter. There is no way to get the gold off this island without anyone knowing.'

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “いずれにせよ、この島から黄金を誰にも知られずに運び出す方法はない”

Steam (ST): "If we had just taken the honorable path and scuttled the sub, none of this would've happened...!!'
Umineko Project (UP): «If we had just taken the honorable path and scuttled the sub, none of this would have happened...!!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'If we had just taken the honorable path and scuttled the sub, none of this would have happened...!!'

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Se tivéssemos optado pelo caminho mais honroso e afundado o submarino, nada disso estaria acontecendo...!!»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “要是在海上選擇了光榮的自沉，就不會發生這種事了…！！”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “要是在海上选择了光荣的自沉，就不会发生这种事了…！！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Se solo ci fossimo comportati onestamente e avessimo affondato il sottomarino, non sarebbe successo nulla di tutto ciò...!!’

Umineko Project (UP): «If we had known back then that the sub was already broken beyond repair......»

PC Japanese (JP): “どうしてあの時、少佐は日本軍に救援要請を？　日本軍にこの黄金のことを知られたら、少佐はどう任務を遂行するつもりだったんだ？”
Russian (RU): «Зачем прапорщик связался с японскими военными и обратился за помощью? Как он планировал осуществить миссию, если они узнают о золоте?»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Por que você pediu ajuda ao exército japonês, subtenente? Como planejava conduzir a missão se eles descobrirem sobre o ouro?»

Steam (ST): "Our mission was a failure from the moment he asked them for help!'

Steam (ST): "All of us have families waiting for us back home. And we've more than done our part, I'd say, voyaging all the way to this island country in the Far East. You might call this fair and just payment for our services.'
Umineko Project (UP): «All of us have families waiting for us back home. And we've more than done our part, I'd say, voyaging all the way to this island country in the Far East. You could call this a fair and just payment for our services.»

PC Japanese (JP): “諸君にも、祖国で待つ家族がいるはずだ。そして極東の島国まで、よく航海に耐えた。それに対する、これは正当な報酬なのだという、考え方もあるっ。”
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “諸君にも、祖国で待つ家族がいるはずだ。そして極東の島国まで、よく航海に耐えた。それに対する、これは正当な報酬なのだという、考え方もあるっ”
Russian (RU): «У всех нас есть семьи, ожидающие нашего возвращения. И я бы сказал, что мы более чем выполнили свою роль, прибыв в такую даль на эту островную страну на Дальнем Востоке. Можно назвать это честной и справедливой оплатой наших услуг.»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Todos nós temos famílias esperando que voltemos para casa. E eu diria que já fizemos mais do que a nossa obrigação, viajando até este país‐ilha do Extremo Oriente. Você poderia considerar isso como sendo um pagamento justo pelos nossos serviços.»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “諸位，你們也理應都有，在祖國等待著你們的家人。並且，你們在來到遠東島國的航海中，做得很好地堅持了下來。對於這些，這是正當的報酬，這種想法也並不為過。”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “诸位，你们也理应都有，在祖国等待着你们的家人。并且，你们在来到远东岛国的航海中，做得很好地坚持了下来。对于这些，这是正当的报酬，这种想法也并不为过。”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Tutti noi abbiamo delle famiglie che ci aspettano a casa. E direi che abbiamo fatto più del dovuto, viaggiando fino a questa nazione in un'isola dell'Estremo Oriente. Lo si potrebbe chiamare una paga giusta ed equa per i nostri servizi. ’

Steam (ST): "And we're the elite. We know the layout of almost the entire base, along with the number of Japanese troops and how they're arranged. If Lieutenant Angelo gives the order, we should be able to subdue them quickly.'
Umineko Project (UP): «And we are elites. We know the layout of almost the entire base, along with the number of Japanese troops and how they are arranged. If Ensign Angelo gives the order, we should be able to subdue them quickly.»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'And we are the elite. We know the layout of almost the entire base, along with the number of Japanese troops and how they are arranged. If Ensign Angelo gives the order, we should be able to subdue them quickly.'
PC Japanese (JP): “我々は精兵です。すでに基地内の間取りのほぼ全てと、日本人の人数、配置状況は把握しています。少尉の命令があれば、短時間で制圧できるでしょう。”
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “我々は精兵です。すでに基地内の間取りのほぼ全てと、日本人の人数、配置状況は把握しています。少尉の命令があれば、短時間で制圧できるでしょう”
Russian (RU): «А мы — элита. Нам известен план почти всей базы, а также число японцев и их размещение. Если прапорщик Анджело отдаст приказ, мы быстро сможем подчинить их.»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «E nós somos a elite. Nós já conhecemos a planta de quase toda a base, bem como o número de soldados japoneses e como estão posicionados. Se o subtenente Angelo der a ordem, nós devemos ser capazes de dominá‐los rapidamente.»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “我們是精兵。且幾乎完全掌握了基地內的平面布局，和日本人的人數及部署。只要有少尉的命令，我們就能在短時間內壓制基地。”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “我们是精兵。且几乎完全掌握了基地内的平面布局，和日本人的人数及部署。只要有少尉的命令，我们就能在短时间内压制基地。”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘E noi siamo l'élite. Conosciamo la pianta di quasi tutta la base, assieme al numero delle truppe giapponesi e la loro disposizione. Se l'alfiere Angelo ci dà l'ordine, dovremmo riuscire a sottometterli alla svelta. ’

Steam (ST): "Only a few of them, Yamamoto included, look like fighters. The rest are just laborers attached to the military. It may look like they have the advantage of numbers, but we have the greater military force.'
Umineko Project (UP): «Only a few of them, Yamamoto included, look like fighters. The rest are just laborers attached to the military. It may look like they have the advantage of numbers, but we have the greater military force.»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Only a few of them, Yamamoto included, look like fighters. The rest are just laborers attached to the military. It may look like they have the advantage of numbers, but we have the greater military force.'
PC Japanese (JP): “戦闘員と思わしきはヤマモトを含めて数人程度。残りは軍属の作業員風情です。上辺の人数は日本人が上ですが、実質兵力ではこちらが優位です。”
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “戦闘員と思わしきはヤマモトを含めて数人程度。残りは軍属の作業員風情です。上辺の人数は日本人が上ですが、実質兵力ではこちらが優位です”
Russian (RU): «Только некоторые из них, включая Ямамото, выглядят как бойцы. Остальные просто рабочие, прикреплённые к военным. У них преимущество в количестве, но у нас большая военная сила.»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Apenas alguns deles, incluindo o Yamamoto, parecem soldados. O resto é só um bando de trabalhadores ligados ao exército. Pode parecer que eles têm uma vantagem numérica, mas temos o maior poderio militar.»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “看著像作戰人員的，包括山本，也就寥寥幾人。剩下的全是區區軍屬作業人員。雖然表面上人數是日本人佔上風，但實質兵力還是我們佔優勢。”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “看着像作战人员的，包括山本，也就寥寥几人。剩下的全是区区军属作业人员。虽然表面上人数是日本人占上风，但实质兵力还是我们占优势。”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Solo qualcuno tra loro, incluso Yamamoto, sembrano lottatori. Gli altri sono solo operai collegati all'esercito. Potrebbero anche avere il vantaggio di essere in tanti, ma noi possediamo una forza militare maggiore. ’

Steam (ST): "If we kill the Japanese, what exactly are we gonna say when the boat comes to pick us up? You really think that'll work?!'

PC Japanese (JP): “日本人を殺せば、迎えの船が来た時、それをどう説明する？　誤魔化しようがないぞ？！”
Russian (RU): «Если убьём японцев, как мы это объясним, когда за нами приедет судно? Ты всерьёз думаешь, что это сработает?!»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Se matarmos os japoneses, como vamos explicar as coisas quando um barco vier por nós? Você acha mesmo que isso vai funcionar?!»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “倘若我們殺了日本人，那等接送的船來時，又當如何解釋？怎麼都蒙不過去啊？！”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “倘若我们杀了日本人，那等接送的船来时，又当如何解释？怎么都蒙不过去啊？！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Se uccidiamo i giapponesi, come lo spiegheremo quando arriverà la nave? {n}Pensi davvero che possa funzionare?!’

Steam (ST): "There should be plenty of ways to work it, as long as the corpses aren't found.'
Umineko Project (UP): «There should be plenty of ways, as long as the corpses aren't found.»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'There should be plenty of ways, as long as the corpses aren't found.'
PC Japanese (JP): “死体さえ見つからなければ、どうとでも誤魔化せます。”
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “死体さえ見つからなければ、どうとでも誤魔化せます”
Russian (RU): «Пока трупы не найдены, есть много способов.»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Devem haver várias formas, contando que não encontrem os corpos.»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “只要不讓人發現屍體，愛怎麼蒙就能怎麼蒙。”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “只要不让人发现尸体，爱怎么蒙就能怎么蒙。”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Ci dovrebbero essere un sacco di modi per farlo, finché i cadaveri non vengono trovati. ’

Steam (ST): "Lieutenant Angelo, ...it'll be easy to subdue this base. If we kill Yamamoto and the few strong fighters, the laborers will probably surrender easily.'
Umineko Project (UP): «Ensign Angelo. ......It will be easy to subdue this base. If we kill Yamamoto and the few strong fighters, the laborers will probably surrender easily.»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Ensign Angelo. ......It will be easy to subdue this base. If we kill Yamamoto and the few strong fighters, the laborers will probably surrender easily.'
PC Japanese (JP): “少尉。……この基地を制圧するのは容易です。ヤマモト以下、主要な兵士数人を殺して見せれば、あっさりと作業員たちは降伏するでしょう。”
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “少尉。……この基地を制圧するのは容易です。ヤマモト以下、主要な兵士数人を殺して見せれば、あっさりと作業員たちは降伏するでしょう”
Russian (RU): «Прапорщик Анджело. ......Подчинить эту базу будет просто. Если убьём Ямамото и нескольких сильных бойцов, рабочие легко сдадутся.»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Subtenente. ......Será fácil dominar esta base. Se matarmos o Yamamoto e alguns dos soldados mais fortes deles, os trabalhadores provavelmente vão se render facilmente.»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “少尉。……壓制這個基地並不難。只要殺幾個山本手下的主要士兵給他們瞧瞧，那幫作業人員就會毫不拖泥帶水地投降吧。”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “少尉。……压制这个基地并不难。只要杀几个山本手下的主要士兵给他们瞧瞧，那帮作业人员就会毫不拖泥带水地投降吧。”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Alfiere Angelo. ... Sarà facile sottomettere questa base. Se facciamo fuori Yamamoto e i pochi lottatori forti rimanenti, probabilmente gli operai si arrenderanno facilmente. ’

Steam (ST): "Let's have them carry the gold and bury it. ...Of course, we'll have to silence them afterwards.'
Umineko Project (UP): «Let's have them carry the gold and bury it. ......Of course, we'll have to silence them afterwards.»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Let's have them carry the gold and bury it. ......Of course, we'll have to silence them afterwards.'
PC Japanese (JP): “彼らに黄金を運ばせ、地中に埋めましょう。……もちろん、彼らの口は永遠に塞ぎますが。”
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “彼らに黄金を運ばせ、地中に埋めましょう。……もちろん、彼らの口は永遠に塞ぎますが”
Russian (RU): «Пусть они переместят золото и погребут его. ......Конечно же, потом мы заставим их замолчать.»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Vamos fazê‐los carregar e enterrar o ouro. ......É claro, precisaremos silenciar eles depois.»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “叫他們來搬黃金，來把黃金埋入地下。……當然，他們的嘴，會在此後被永遠堵住。”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “叫他们来搬黄金，来把黄金埋入地下。……当然，他们的嘴，会在此后被永远堵住。”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Costringiamoli a trasportare l'oro e a sotterrarlo. ... Ovviamente, in seguito dovremo farli tacere. ’

Steam (ST): "Are you suggesting we massacre all of them...?'
Umineko Project (UP): «Are you suggesting we massacre all of them......?»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Are you suggesting we massacre all of them......?'
PC Japanese (JP): “日本人たちを、皆殺しにするということか……。”
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): “日本人たちを、皆殺しにするということか……”
Russian (RU): «Предлагаешь устроить резню?..»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Está sugerindo que massacremos todos eles......?»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “這話是指，要把日本人全都殺光嗎……？”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “这话是指，要把日本人全都杀光吗……？”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Stai proponendo di compiere un massacro...?’

Umineko Project (UP): «Let's do it. If we kill them all, no one will have to know about the gold.»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Let's do it. If we kill them all, no one will have to know about the gold.'

Chinese Simplified (CN): “下手吧。只要把他们全都杀了，黄金的事就不会被任何人知道了。”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Facciamolo. Se li uccidiamo tutti, nessuno dovrà venire a conoscenza dell'oro. ’

Steam (ST): It had been a surprise attack. ...Lieutenant Yamamoto had probably judged that the negotiations wouldn't go his way and had decided to make the first move.

PC Japanese (JP): 奇襲だった。……恐らく山本中尉は、アンジェロ少尉たちとの交渉で、彼らが言いなりにならないとの感触を得て先手を打ってきたのだ。
