Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是場奇襲。……恐怕山本中尉是感到，與安杰洛少尉等人的交涉不會照他們講的進展，而先下手為強了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是场奇袭。……恐怕山本中尉是感到，与安杰洛少尉等人的交涉不会照他们讲的进展，而先下手为强了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Si era trattato di un attacco a sorpresa. ... Il tenente Yamamoto, probabilmente, aveva pensato che le trattative non sarebbero andate come desiderava e aveva scelto di fare la prima mossa.

Steam (ST): Or, maybe he'd been planning from the beginning to put them in a position where they'd be gathered in one place to discuss his offer.
Umineko Project (UP): Or else, maybe he had been planning from the beginning to put them in the position of having to take a vote...in order to gather them all in one place.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Or else, maybe he had been planning from the beginning to put them in a position where they would be gathered in one place to discuss his offer.
PC Japanese (JP): いや、ひょっとすると、全員で決を採らねばならないように仕向け、集まったところを一網打尽にしようと、初めから狙っていたのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Или, может, он с самого начала планировал поставить их в такое положение, когда они соберутся в одном месте для обсуждения его предложения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ou talvez, pode ser que ele estivesse planejando desde o início colocá‐los em uma posição em que tivessem que votar...a fim de reuni‐los em um único local fechado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不，搞不好，他是在誘導他們進入不得不所有人一起表決的狀況，從一開始就計劃著，趁意大利人全體集合時一網打盡也說不定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不，搞不好，他是在诱导他们进入不得不所有人一起表决的状况，从一开始就计划着，趁意大利人全体集合时一网打尽也说不定。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Oppure, potrebbe aver pianificato sin dall'inizio di metterli in una posizione in cui potessero rimanere uniti in un posto per discutere sulla sua offerta.

Steam (ST): Rokkenjima was their island. If they killed all the Italians, then not half, but all of the gold would go to the Japanese.
Umineko Project (UP): Rokkenjima belonged to the Japanese. If they killed all of the Italians, then not half, but all of the gold would go to them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rokkenjima was their island. If they killed all of the Italians, then not half, but all of the gold would go to the Japanese.
PC Japanese (JP): 六軒島は彼らの島だ。イタリア人を皆殺しにすれば、黄金は五分五分どころか、その全てが日本人のものなのだ。
Russian (RU): Роккенджима — их остров. Если они убьют всех итальянцев, японцам достанется всё золото, а не половина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rokkenjima pertence aos japoneses. Se eles matassem todos os italianos, e não metade, todo o ouro seria deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 六軒島是他們的島。只要把意大利人全殺光了，黃金哪用得著五五分啊，全都將會歸日本人所有。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 六轩岛是他们的岛。只要把意大利人全杀光了，黄金哪用得着五五分啊，全都将会归日本人所有。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rokkenjima era la loro isola. Se uccidessero tutti gli italiani, non la metà, ma tutto l'oro andrebbe ai giapponesi.

Steam (ST): There was a chance the grenade might go off late. The Italians rushed out into the corridor.
Umineko Project (UP): There was still a chance the grenade might go off late.{n}The Italians rushed out into the corridor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There was a chance the grenade might go off late. The Italians rushed out into the corridor.
PC Japanese (JP): 手榴弾が遅れて爆発しないとも限らない。彼らは廊下へ飛び出る。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 手榴弾が遅れて爆発しないとも限らない。{n}彼らは廊下へ飛び出る。
Russian (RU): Был шанс, что граната может сработать позже.{n}Итальянцы выскочили в коридор.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda havia a chance da granada só estar retardada.{n}Os italianos saíram correndo pelo corredor.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 說不準手榴彈是否過會兒就會爆炸。{n}他們跑出房間，衝到了走廊上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 说不准手榴弹是否过会儿就会爆炸。{n}他们跑出房间，冲到了走廊上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): C'era la possibilità che la granata potesse esplodere in ritardo. Gli italiani si riversarono nel corridoio.

Steam (ST): They heard gunfire from down the hallway. It was coming from the direction of the submarine dock. Clearly, the troops guarding the pile of gold were being attacked.
Umineko Project (UP): They heard gunfire from down the hallway. It was coming from the direction of the submarine dock. Clearly, the troops guarding the pile of gold were being attacked.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They heard gunfire from down the hallway. It was coming from the direction of the submarine dock. Clearly, the troops guarding the pile of gold were being attacked.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼方より銃声が聞こえる。潜水艦ドックの方だ。黄金の山を警備させている兵士たちが襲われているのは明白だ。
Russian (RU): Из прохода доносились выстрелы. Похоже, они шли со стороны дока субмарин. Очевидно, напали на отряд, охраняющий груду золота.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eles ouviram tiros vindo do corredor. Estava vindo da doca do submarino. Claramente, os soldados vigiando a pilha de ouro estavam sendo atacados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 聽見了遠方傳來的槍聲。是潛水艇船塢的方向。顯然，受命看守金山的士兵們，正在遭到襲擊。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 听见了远方传来的枪声。是潜水艇船坞的方向。显然，受命看守金山的士兵们，正在遭到袭击。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sentirono la sparatoria dal corridoio. Veniva dal molo del sottomarino. Chiaramente, stavano attaccando le truppe a guardia dell'oro.

Steam (ST): "Lieutenant Angelo!! What are your orders?!!'
Umineko Project (UP): «Ensign Angelo!! What are your orders?!!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Ensign Angelo!! What are your orders?!!'
PC Japanese (JP): “少尉ッ！！　ご命令を！！”
Russian (RU): «Прапорщик Анджело! Что прикажете?!!»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Subtenente!! Quais são suas ordens?!»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “少尉！！請下令！！”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “少尉！！请下令！！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Alfiere Angelo!! I suoi ordini?!!’

Steam (ST): "We have no choice!! Kill the Japanese!!'
Umineko Project (UP): «We have no choice!! Kill the Japanese!!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'We have no choice!! Kill the Japanese!!'
PC Japanese (JP): “やむを得ん！！　日本人は殺せッ！！”
Russian (RU): «У нас нет выбора! Убить японцев!»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Não temos escolha!! Matem os japoneses!!»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “不得已！！殺了日本人！！”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “不得已！！杀了日本人！！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Non abbiamo scelta!! Fate fuori i giapponesi!!’

Steam (ST): "L-Lieutenant! These guys are good. Those Italians aren't your ordinary sailors!"
Umineko Project (UP): "L‐Lieutenant! These guys are good. Those Italians aren't your ordinary sailors!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "L, Lieutenant! These guys are good. Those Italians aren't your ordinary sailors!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ちゅ、中尉！　あいつら出来ます！！　このイタ公連中、ただの船乗りじゃねぇ！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ちゅ、中尉！　あいつら出来ます！！　この連中、ただの船乗りじゃねぇ！」
Russian (RU): "Ле... лейтенант! Они хороши. Эти итальянцы не простые моряки!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "T‐Tenente! Esses caras são bons. Esses italianos não são simples marinheiros!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「中、中尉！那幫傢伙身手不錯！！這幫意大利佬，不是普通的船夫！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「中、中尉！那帮家伙身手不错！！这帮意大利佬，不是普通的船夫！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "T-Tenente! Questi tizi sono abili. Gli italiani non sono dei marinai qualunque!"

Steam (ST): "Heheh, I see. They needed men good enough to guard that gold, after all. We have the numbers. Keep your cool, surround them, and kill them!! Let's hunt some Italians!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Heheh, I see, they needed men good enough to guard that gold. We have the numbers. Keep your cool, surround them, and kill them!! Let's hunt some Italians!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Heheh, I see. They needed men good enough to guard that gold. We have the numbers. Keep your cool, surround them, and kill them!! Let's hunt some Italians!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「くっくっく、なるほど、黄金の番人を任されるだけの兵士ということか。人数はこちらが上だ。焦らず、囲んで殺せ！！　イタ公狩りだ！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「くっくっく、なるほど、黄金の番人を任されるだけの兵士ということか。人数はこちらが上だ。焦らず、囲んで殺せ！！　イタリア人狩りだ！！」
Russian (RU): "Хе‐хех, ясно, для охраны золота им были нужны достаточно хорошие люди. Нас больше. Сохраняйте спокойствие, окружите их и убейте! Устроим охоту на итальянцев!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Heheh, entendi, eles precisavam de homens bons o suficiente para guardar aquele ouro. Nós temos maior número. Fiquem calmos, cerquem eles e matem!! Vamos caçar italianos!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呵呵呵，原來如此，這是代表著，這幫士兵到底是有被任命當黃金守護者的本事的麼？在人數上我們佔上風。別急，包圍了再殺！！來狩獵意大利佬！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呵呵呵，原来如此，这是代表着，这帮士兵到底是有被任命当黄金守护者的本事的么？在人数上我们占上风。别急，包围了再杀！！来狩猎意大利佬！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Heheh, capisco. Avevano bisogno di uomini abbastanza bravi da fare da guardia all'oro. Noi siamo in vantaggio numerico. Rimanete calmi, circondateli, e uccideteli!! Andiamo a caccia di italiani!!"

Steam (ST): As soon as I heard the sound of repeated gunfire, I knew.
Umineko Project (UP): As soon as I heard the sound of repeated gunfire, I knew.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 連発する発砲音を聞いた時、私はすぐに直感した。
Russian (RU): Услышав повторяющиеся выстрелы, я понял.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Logo que ouvi o repetitivo som de tiro, eu soube.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在聽到連聲槍響時，我馬上就憑直覺感受到了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在听到连声枪响时，我马上就凭直觉感受到了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non appena sentii il rumore della sparatoria, lo capii.

Steam (ST): I knew that something, which had been smoldering since the time the gold was unloaded, had finally burst.
Umineko Project (UP): I knew that whatever it was that had been smoldering since the time the gold was unloaded......had finally burst into flame.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I knew that something, which had been smoldering since the time the gold was unloaded, had finally burst.
PC Japanese (JP): あの黄金が荷揚げされた日から、燻っていた何かが、とうとう破裂したのだと直感した。
Russian (RU): Мне стало ясно, что нечто тлеющее ещё с тех пор, как золото выгрузили, наконец взорвалось.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu soube que o que quer que estivesse latejando desde o momento em que o ouro foi descarregado......finalmente havia explodido em chamas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 憑直覺感到，自那堆黃金被卸下潛水艇的那一天起，一直“鼓鼓的”的什麼，終於炸裂了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 凭直觉感到，自那堆黄金被卸下潜水艇的那一天起，一直“鼓鼓的”的什么，终于炸裂了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Capii che qualcosa, che stava fumando sin da quando l'oro venne scaricato, era finalmente esploso.

Steam (ST): The eyes of our soldiers looking at that gold hadn't been normal. Yes, those eyes had been entranced by demons.
Umineko Project (UP): The eyes of our soldiers when looking at the gold had not been normal. Yes, those eyes had been entranced by demons.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When looking at the gold, the eyes of our soldiers hadn't been normal. Yes, those eyes had been entranced by demons.
PC Japanese (JP): 中尉たちが黄金を見る目は、尋常ではなかった。そう、あれは悪魔に魅せられた目だった。
Russian (RU): При виде золота глаза наших солдат не были нормальными. Да, их глаза очаровали демоны.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os olhares de nossos soldados não estavam normais na hora em que viram o ouro. Sim, aqueles eram olhos de quem foi encantado pelo demônio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 中尉他們看黃金時的眼神，非比尋常。對，那是被惡魔迷住了的眼神。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 中尉他们看黄金时的眼神，非比寻常。对，那是被恶魔迷住了的眼神。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mentre guardavano l'oro, gli occhi dei nostri soldati non erano normali. {n}Già, quegli occhi erano stati rapiti dai demoni.

Steam (ST): The Italians had been pushed to the limits by the heavy burden they bore.
Umineko Project (UP): The Italians had also been at breaking point due to the heavy burden they bore.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Italians had been pushed to the limits by the heavy burden they bore.
PC Japanese (JP): イタリア人たちも、重責から心がはちきれそうになっていた。
Russian (RU): Итальянцы были до пределов нагружены тяжёлым бременем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os italianos também estavam em um ponto crucial devido ao peso que estavam carregando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那幫意大利人，也是出於重責，心都瀕臨崩潰了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那帮意大利人，也是出于重责，心都濒临崩溃了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gli italiani erano stati spinti al limite delle loro forze dal pesante fardello che portavano.

Steam (ST): Who wouldn't have snapped after being trapped in a distant land, where you can't understand the language or the writing?
Umineko Project (UP): Who wouldn't have snapped after becoming trapped in a distant land where you can't understand the language or the writing?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Who wouldn't have snapped after being trapped in a distant land, where you can't understand the language or the writing?
PC Japanese (JP): 遠い異国の地で、言葉も文字もわからない世界に取り残されたら、おかしくならない方がおかしい。
Russian (RU): Кто бы не спохватился, попав в ловушку в далёкой стране, где не понимаешь язык и не можешь писать?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quem não se desesperaria após ficar preso em uma ilha distante, onde você não consegue entender a língua nem a escrita?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在遙遠異國的土地，被遺留在語言文字都聽不懂、看不懂的世界，人若不變反常，那才叫反常。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在遥远异国的土地，被遗留在语言文字都听不懂、看不懂的世界，人若不变反常，那才叫反常。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Chi non avrebbe esaurito la pazienza dopo essere stato intrappolato in un territorio remoto, in cui non poteva comprendere né il linguaggio, né la scrittura?

Steam (ST): Thinking I had to do something, I ran towards the sound of gunfire.
Umineko Project (UP): Thinking I had to do something, I ran towards the sound of gunfire.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): とにかく、何とかしなくてはならないと思い、発砲音の聞こえる方へ走った。
Russian (RU): Думая, что мне нужно что‐то сделать, я побежал на звук выстрелов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Acreditando que eu precisava fazer alguma coisa, eu corri na direção dos tiros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當時我想到了，總之得先去設法做些什麼，朝傳來槍聲的方向跑了過去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当时我想到了，总之得先去设法做些什么，朝传来枪声的方向跑了过去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pensando che dovessi fare qualcosa, corsi verso il rumore della sparatoria.

Steam (ST): ...Looking back on it, that was an extremely stupid thing to do.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Looking back on it, that was an extremely foolish thing to do.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Looking back on it, that was an extremely stupid thing to do.
PC Japanese (JP): ……今にして思えば、それはとても愚かしいことだ。
Russian (RU): ......Если подумать, это было ужасно глупо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Pensando nisso agora, foi uma decisão muito idiota.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……現在一想，這麼做實在是非常愚蠢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……现在一想，这么做实在是非常愚蠢。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Col senno di poi, fu una cosa estremamente stupida da fare.

Steam (ST): That sound meant that there were people shooting at each other. People killing each other.
Umineko Project (UP): That sound meant that there were people shooting at each other. People killing each other.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That sound meant that there were people shooting at each other. People killing each other.
PC Japanese (JP): それは銃撃戦を意味する音。殺し合いを意味する音。
Russian (RU): Этот звук означал, что там люди стреляют друг в друга. Люди убивают друг друга.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquele som significa que haviam pessoas atirando umas nas outras. Pessoas matando umas as outras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那可是，意味著槍戰的聲音。意味著你死我活的聲音。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那可是，意味着枪战的声音。意味着你死我活的声音。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel rumore significava che delle persone si stavano sparando. Si stavano uccidendo.

Steam (ST): And yet, unarmed as I was, I dashed towards the sound, as though I was trying to mediate some schoolyard fight. ...It didn't take long before I learned how foolish and naive that was in the heat of battle.
Umineko Project (UP): And yet, unarmed as I was, I dashed towards the sound, as though I was trying to mediate some schoolyard fight. ......It didn't take long before I learned how foolish and naive such a thing was in the heat of battle.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And yet, unarmed as I was, I dashed towards the sound, as though I was trying to mediate some schoolyard fight. ......It didn't take long before I learned how foolish and naive such a thing was in the heat of battle.
PC Japanese (JP): なのに私は丸腰で、まるで喧嘩の仲裁にでも行くようなつもりで、駆けている。……それが如何に愚かしく、この戦時に浮世離れしたものか、すぐに思い知る。
Russian (RU): И всё равно я без всякого оружия бросился на звук, будто чтобы остановить школьную драку. ......Вскоре я понял, как глупо и наивно было делать так в пылу сражения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E mesmo assim, desarmado, eu corri na direção do som, como se eu estivesse indo tentar mediar uma briga de escola. ......Não demorou muito para eu descobrir o quão tolo e ingênuo era fazer algo assim no calor da batalha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可儘管如此，我卻赤手空拳，簡直就像是去勸架般地拔腿飛奔。……然後我馬上就體會到了，這是有多麼的愚蠢，有多麼的不了解戰爭亂世。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可尽管如此，我却赤手空拳，简直就像是去劝架般地拔腿飞奔。……然后我马上就体会到了，这是有多么的愚蠢，有多么的不了解战争乱世。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Malgrado ciò, disarmato com'ero, sfrecciai verso quel rumore, come se stessi tentando di porre fine ad una lite in una scuola. ... Non ci misi molto prima di capire quanto fosse una cosa folle e ingenua da fare nel bel mezzo di una battaglia.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "...H-Hiraoka?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......H‐Hiraoka?!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......H, Hiraoka?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……ひ、平岡兵曹？！」
Russian (RU): "......Хи... Хираока?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Hi‐Hiraoka?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……平、平岡軍曹？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……平、平冈军曹？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... H-Hiraoka?!"

Steam (ST): Warrant Officer Hiraoka was lying face down, his entire body drenched in blood.
Umineko Project (UP): Warrant Officer Hiraoka was lying face down, his entire body drenched in blood.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 彼は血で全身を濡らして、うつ伏せに倒れていた。
Russian (RU): Уорент‐офицер Хираока лежал лицом вниз весь в крови.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O suboficial Hiraoka estava caído e virado para o chão, com todo o seu corpo encharcado de sangue.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他血染全身，趴在地上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il maresciallo Hiraoka giaceva prono, con l'intero corpo inzuppato di sangue.

Steam (ST): Judging by the trail of blood behind him, it was clear that he had somehow managed to crawl here from a different room before dying.
Umineko Project (UP): Judging by the trail of blood behind him, it was clear that he had somehow managed to crawl here from a different room before dying.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Judging by the trail of blood behind him, it was clear that he had somehow managed to crawl here from a different room before dying.
PC Japanese (JP): 血の跡がべっとりと続き、部屋から何とかここまで這いずってきて、絶命したことが見て取れた。
Russian (RU): Судя по кровавому следу за ним, очевидно, ему кое‐как удалось перед смертью уползти сюда из другой комнаты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Julgando pelo rastro de sangue atrás dele, estava claro que ele havia conseguido rastejar até aqui, vindo de um lugar diferente antes de morrer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 身後拖著粘糊糊的血跡，看起來，他是從房中好不容易爬到了此處，在此喪的命。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 身后拖着粘糊糊的血迹，看起来，他是从房中好不容易爬到了此处，在此丧的命。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A giudicare dalla striscia di sangue dietro di lui, era chiaro che fosse in qualche modo riuscito a strisciare fin qui da una stanza diversa prima di morire.

Steam (ST): No, he was still twitching. He might not be dead yet.
Umineko Project (UP): No, he was still twitching. He might not be dead yet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No, he was still twitching. He might not be dead yet.
PC Japanese (JP): いや、まだ痙攣している。絶命はしていないのかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Нет, он ещё дёргался. Может, он и не мёртв.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, ele ainda estava se contraindo. Talvez não estivesse morto ainda.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不，還在抽搐。也許還沒喪命。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不，还在抽搐。也许还没丧命。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No, si sta ancora agitando. Potrebbe non essere morto.

Steam (ST): ...But, on this island without a doctor... ...no, even if we had a doctor, who could possibly... save a man who had been shot this many times in the chest...
Umineko Project (UP): ......But, on this island without a doctor—no, even if we had a doctor...how could anyone possibly......save a man who had been shot this many times in the chest...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......But, on this island without a doctor......no, even if we had a doctor... how could anyone possibly......save a man who had been shot this many times in the chest...
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、医者などいないこの島で、……いや、医者がいたとしても、こんな、何発も撃たれて、胸が抉れて、……助かるはずなどあるものか…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……しかし、医者などいないこの島で、……いや、医者がいたとしても、こんな、何発も撃たれて、胸が抉れて、……助かるはずなどあるものか…。
Russian (RU): ......Но на этом острове без врача...... нет, даже если бы у нас был врач... как можно...... спасти того, кому много раз прострелили грудь...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas, em uma ilha sem médicos—não, mesmo que tivéssemos um médico...como qualquer um poderia......salvar um homem que levou tantos tiros no peito...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……然而，在沒有醫生的這個島上，……不，就算有醫生好了，像這樣身中數槍，胸都被轟爛了，……哪可能還能得救啊…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……然而，在没有医生的这个岛上，……不，就算有医生好了，像这样身中数枪，胸都被轰烂了，……哪可能还能得救啊…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma, su quest'isola senza un dottore... no, anche se ci fosse stato... come si potrebbe... salvare un uomo ferito così tante volte al petto...

Steam (ST): When I looked into the room he must have crawled out of, I saw two more bloodstained Japanese corpses.
Umineko Project (UP): When I looked into the room he must have crawled out of, I saw two more blood‐stained Japanese corpses.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I looked into the room he must have crawled out of, I saw two more blood-stained Japanese corpses.
PC Japanese (JP): 這い出てきたに違いない室内を見ると、荒れ果て、他にも２人の日本人の血塗れの死体があった。
Russian (RU): Заглянув в комнату, из которой он выполз, я увидел ещё два окровавленных трупа японцев.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando olhei para dentro da sala de onde ele deve ter saído rastejando, eu vi os cadáveres de mais dois japoneses encharcados de sangue.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 瞧了瞧無疑是他爬出來的那間房的室內，看到了，房中亂七八糟，還倒著另兩名渾身是血的日本人的屍體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 瞧了瞧无疑是他爬出来的那间房的室内，看到了，房中乱七八糟，还倒着另两名浑身是血的日本人的尸体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando guardai nella stanza da cui doveva essere strisciato fuori, vidi altri due cadaveri giapponesi macchiati di sangue.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "A-Aaah...aaaah... Th...They're d..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Ah, aaah......aaaah...... Th‐......they're d......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ah, aaah......aaaah...... Th, ......they're d......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ah, aaah......aaaah...... El‐......Eles estão m......"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ah, aaah... aaaah... s... sono m..."

Steam (ST): I fell backwards pathetically on my butt, my mouth hanging open in shock...
Umineko Project (UP): I fell backwards pathetically on my butt, my mouth hanging open in shock......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 情けなく尻餅を付き、口を閉じることさえ忘れ、呆然とする……。
Russian (RU): Я убого упал на зад с раскрытым от шока ртом......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu caí de bunda no chão, em estado de choque, com a minha boca aberta......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不像樣地坐倒在地，我把閉上自己的嘴都給忘了，目瞪口呆……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不像样地坐倒在地，我把闭上自己的嘴都给忘了，目瞪口呆……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Caddi pateticamente all'indietro sul mio sedere, con la bocca spalancata dallo stupore...

Steam (ST): ...Come to think of it, that was the first time I had ever faced death in my life.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Come to think of it, that was the first time I had ever faced death in my life.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……思えばそれが、生まれて初めて知る、人の死というものだった。
Russian (RU): ......Если подумать, я впервые в своей жизни видел смерть.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Pensando nisso, aquela foi a primeira vez em minha vida que eu me deparei com a morte.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……想來，那是我自出生時起，首次得知，人的死是怎麼一回事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……想来，那是我自出生时起，首次得知，人的死是怎么一回事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ora che ci penso, quella fu la prima volta che affrontai la morte in vita mia.

Steam (ST): The entire world was at war. Even though millions were dying both East and West, ...this was the first time I'd met with a person's death directly.
Umineko Project (UP): The entire world was at war. Even though millions were dying both East and West, ......this was the first time I met with a person's death directly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The entire world was at war. Even though millions were dying both East and West, ......this was the first time I met with a person's death directly.
PC Japanese (JP): 世界中が戦争をしている。洋の東西で、大勢の人が死んでいるこの戦時下でありながらも、……それが初めて直面する人の死だったのだ。
Russian (RU): Война охватила весь мир. Даже если умирали миллионы как на Западе, так и на Востоке...... я впервые увидел смерть человека своими глазами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O mundo estava em guerra. Mesmo com milhões morrendo no ocidente e oriente, ......aquela foi a primeira vez que eu vi uma pessoa morta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 全世界都在打仗。明明身處，許許多多的人在大洋東西死去的戰爭時期，……可這卻是我第一次直接面對的，人之死。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 全世界都在打仗。明明身处，许许多多的人在大洋东西死去的战争时期，……可这却是我第一次直接面对的，人之死。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il mondo intero era in guerra. Sebbene milioni di persone stessero morendo sia in Occidente che in Oriente... fu la prima volta che mi imbattei direttamente nella morte di una persona.

Steam (ST): Ridiculous. ...Didn't I join the army hoping to die?
Umineko Project (UP): Ridiculous. ......Didn't I join the army hoping to die?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Ridiculous. ......Didn't I join the army hoping to die?
PC Japanese (JP): 滑稽なものだ。……私は死にたくて軍隊を望んだのではないのか？
Russian (RU): Как нелепо. ......Разве не я вступил в армию в надежде умереть?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ridículo. ......Eu não me juntei ao exército para morrer?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真滑稽。……我不就是為了想死，才參軍的麼？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真滑稽。……我不就是为了想死，才参军的么？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ridicolo. ... Non sono entrato nell'esercito per morire?

Steam (ST): Didn't I whine about not being sent to the front lines?
Umineko Project (UP): Didn't I whine about not being sent to the front lines?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): 死にたくて、戦地に送られなかったことを嘆いたのではなかったか？
Russian (RU): Разве не я скулил о том, что меня не отправили на фронт?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não reclamei por não ter sido enviado para as linhas de frente?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我不是曾好想去死，曾為沒能被送往戰地而哀聲嘆氣過麼？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我不是曾好想去死，曾为没能被送往战地而哀声叹气过么？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non mi lamentavo del fatto che non mi avessero mandato al fronte?

Steam (ST): Yeah, so rejoice, Kinzo. Isn't this the death you were looking for...?!
Umineko Project (UP): Yeah, so rejoice, Kinzo. Isn't this the death you were looking for...?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): あぁ、なら喜べ、金蔵。これが、私の望んだ死ではないか…！
Russian (RU): Да, так что радуйся, Кинзо. Ты ведь искал смерть?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sim, então alegre‐se, Kinzo. Não é essa a morte que você tanto buscou...?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是啊，那麼，歡欣雀躍吧，金藏。這不就是，你所期望的死嗎…？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是啊，那么，欢欣雀跃吧，金藏。这不就是，你所期望的死吗…？！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Già, perciò gioisci, Kinzo. Non è questa la morte che stavi cercando...?!

Steam (ST): Why not spread your hands and yell out loud? "Come for me, magnificent death!!"
Umineko Project (UP): Why not spread your hands and yell out loud? "Come for me, magnificent death!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Why not spread your hands and yell out loud? 'Come for me, magnificent death!!'
PC Japanese (JP): なぜ両手を広げてこう叫べない？　来たれ、偉大なる死よッ、と！！
Russian (RU): Почему бы не раскинуть руки и не прокричать?«Приди за мной, желанная смерть!»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por que não abre seus braços e grita bem alto? "Venha até mim, gloriosa morte!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為什麼不張開雙臂大叫？大叫“來吧，偉大的死”？！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为什么不张开双臂大叫？大叫“来吧，伟大的死”？！！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché non apri le braccia e lo gridi forte? ‘Vieni a prendermi, o magnifica morte!!’

Steam (ST): Someone came running towards me. It was a colleague of mine, a Japanese man. Tajima-kun.
Umineko Project (UP): Someone came running towards me. It was a colleague of mine, a Japanese man. Tajima‐kun.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Someone came running towards me. It was a colleague of mine, a Japanese man. Tajima-kun.
PC Japanese (JP): 誰かが駆けて来る。同僚だ、日本人だ。田島くんだ。
Russian (RU): Ко мне кто‐то бежал. Мой коллега, японец. Таджима.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Alguém veio correndo na minha direção. Era um colega meu, um japonês que eu chamava de Tajima‐kun.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 有誰跑了過來。是同僚，是日本人。是田島君。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 有谁跑了过来。是同僚，是日本人。是田岛君。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Qualcuno corse verso di me. Era un mio collega, un giapponese. Tajima-kun.

PC Japanese (JP): 「にッ、ににッ、にぃッ…！！」
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「快、快快、快快快…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): He dashed towards me, pale-faced and out of breath.
Umineko Project (UP): He dashed towards me, pale‐faced and out of breath.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He dashed towards me, pale-faced and out of breath.
PC Japanese (JP): 顔面を蒼白にしながら、ものすごい形相で駆けて来る。
Russian (RU): Он бросился ко мне, бледный и запыхавшийся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele passou correndo por mim, com o rosto pálido e sem ar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他臉色蒼白，擺著張極其駭人的臉跑了過來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他脸色苍白，摆着张极其骇人的脸跑了过来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Corse velocemente verso di me, con un volto pallido e senza fiato.

Steam (ST): His face seemed horribly contorted with terror. Mine probably looked the same.
Umineko Project (UP): His face seemed horribly contorted with terror. Mine probably looked the same.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): His face seemed horribly contorted with terror. Mine probably looked the same.
PC Japanese (JP): くしゃくしゃに歪んだ酷い顔だった。そしてそれが、きっと自分の顔でもあるのだ。
Russian (RU): Его лицо страшно скривилось от ужаса. Моё, наверное, выглядело точно так же.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sua cara parecia terrivelmente contorcida pelo terror. A minha provavelmente deveria estar igual.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那是一張，歪歪扭扭得一塌糊塗的不像樣的臉。而這張臉，肯定就是此刻我自己的臉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那是一张，歪歪扭扭得一塌糊涂的不像样的脸。而这张脸，肯定就是此刻我自己的脸。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il suo viso sembrava terribilmente contorto dal dolore. Probabilmente anche il mio lo era.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Tajima-kun, ...wh-what happened...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Tajima‐kun... Wh‐what happened......?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Tajima-kun... Wh, what happened......?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「田島くん…、な、何があったんだ……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「田島くん…、な、何があったんだ……」
Russian (RU): "Таджима... Ч‐что случилось?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Tajima‐kun... O‐O que aconteceu......?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「田島君…，出、出什麼事了……？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「田岛君…，出、出什么事了……？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Tajima-kun... c-cosa è successo...?"

Steam (ST): "R-Run away... W-We'll...we'll all be killed!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "R‐run away... W‐we'll...we'll all be killed!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "R, run away... W, we'll...we'll all be killed!!"

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "F‐Fuja... V‐Vamos...ser todos mortos!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「快、快逃…。會、會、會被殺的————！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「快、快逃…。会、会、会被杀的————！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "S-Scappa... C-C... Ci uccideranno tutti!!"

Steam (ST): Someone yelled in Italian, and at the same time, Tajima-kun let out a scream...
Umineko Project (UP): Someone yelled in Italian, and at the same time, Tajima‐kun let out a scream...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Someone yelled in Italian, and at the same time, Tajima-kun let out a scream...
PC Japanese (JP): イタリア語の怒声と共に、田島くんが爆ぜた悲鳴をあげる…。
Russian (RU): Кто‐то крикнул по‐итальянски, и одновременно с этим Таджима закричал...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Alguém gritou em italiano e, ao mesmo tempo, o Tajima‐kun também gritou...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 與意大利語的怒吼一起，田島君發出了炸裂般的慘叫聲…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 与意大利语的怒吼一起，田岛君发出了炸裂般的惨叫声…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Qualcuno gridò in italiano, e allo stesso tempo, Tajima-kun lanciò un urlo...

Steam (ST): Then, he grabbed onto me as he fell to the floor.
Umineko Project (UP): Then, he grabbed onto me as he fell to the floor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, he grabbed onto me as he fell to the floor.
PC Japanese (JP): そしてそのまま、腰を落として取っ組みかかってくるかのように、私に飛び込んできた。
Russian (RU): Упав на пол, он схватился за меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, ele me agarrou enquanto caía no chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著他就這樣，腰一軟，如要找我打架般，朝我飛撲了過來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着他就这样，腰一软，如要找我打架般，朝我飞扑了过来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi, si aggrappò a me mentre cadeva sul pavimento.

Steam (ST): A red stain was spreading across his back before my eyes...
Umineko Project (UP): A red stain was spreading across his back before my eyes...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A red stain was spreading across his back before my eyes...
PC Japanese (JP): 彼の背中から血が噴き出て、みるみる真っ赤に染まっていく…。
Russian (RU): На моих глазах по его спине расползалось красное пятно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma mancha vermelha se espalhou em suas costas diante dos meus olhos...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從其背脊噴出鮮血，眼睜睜地看著他的後背被染得通紅…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从其背脊喷出鲜血，眼睁睁地看着他的后背被染得通红…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Una macchia rossa si stava espandendo sulla sua schiena davanti ai miei occhi...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Tajima...kun..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Tajima‐ku...n......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Tajima...kun......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「田島く、ん……ッ、」
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Tajima... kun..."

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "S... Scap ... *cough* ..."

Steam (ST): As he spat bubbles of blood, he said that one word...and died.
Umineko Project (UP): As he spat bubbles of blood, .........he said that one word......and died.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As he spat bubbles of blood, he said that one word......and died.
PC Japanese (JP): 血の泡を吐きながら、………それだけを伝え、絶命する。
Russian (RU): Сплюнув кровавые пузыри, он сказал одно слово...... и умер.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto cuspia bolhas de sangue, .........ele disse aquela única palavra......e morreu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 口吐血沫，………田島君只說了這一句話，就斷氣了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 口吐血沫，………田岛君只说了这一句话，就断气了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sputando bolle di sangue, disse quell'unica parola... e morì.

Steam (ST): But the shock of seeing someone die right in front of me did not freeze my heart.
Umineko Project (UP): But the shocking event of seeing someone die right in front of me did not capture my attention.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But the shock of seeing someone die right in front of me did not freeze my heart.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし私は、絶命の瞬間を目の当たりにするという衝撃的な出来事には、心を奪われなかった。
Russian (RU): Но я застыл не от шока при виде того, как кто‐то умер у меня на глазах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas o chocante evento de ver alguém morrendo bem na minha frente não capturou a minha atenção.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，我卻並未被親眼目睹喪命瞬間的衝擊性場面，剝奪了注意力。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，我却并未被亲眼目睹丧命瞬间的冲击性场面，剥夺了注意力。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma lo shock per aver visto qualcuno di fronte a me morire non congelò il mio cuore.

Steam (ST): ...At a fundamental level, all living things are unconcerned with the deaths of others. The one thing that matters is whether they themselves die or not.
Umineko Project (UP): ......No living thing is concerned with the deaths of others at a fundamental level. The one thing that matters is whether they themselves die or not.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......At a fundamental level, all living things aren't concerned with the deaths of others. The one thing that matters is whether they themselves die or not.
PC Japanese (JP): ……生きとし生けるものは、本来、他人の死など関心はないのだ。その唯一の関心は、自分が死ぬかどうかにだけ、割かれるのだ。
Russian (RU): ......На фундаментальном уровне все живые существа не озабочены смертью других. Имеет значение лишь то, они умирают или нет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Nenhuma coisa viva está preocupada com a morte de outros em um nível fundamental. A única coisa que importa é se elas mesmas morrem ou não.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……一切生物，原本，並不關心他人的死。對死唯一的關心，只在於自己會不會死。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……一切生物，原本，并不关心他人的死。对死唯一的关心，只在于自己会不会死。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ad un livello fondamentale, le creature viventi non si preoccupano per le morti degli altri. L'unica cosa che importa è la propria sopravvivenza.

Steam (ST): It was the barrel of the gun the Italian soldier was pointing that froze my heart...
Umineko Project (UP): My attention was fully occupied by the barrel of the gun the Italian soldier was pointing......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was the barrel of the gun the Italian soldier was pointing that froze my heart......
PC Japanese (JP): イタリア人が見せる、銃口の奥底だけが、私の心を奪っていた……。
Russian (RU): Я застыл при виде наставленного ствола итальянского солдата......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha atenção estava tomada pelo cano da arma que o soldado italiano estava apontando......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 只有意大利人亮出的槍口深處，能剝奪我的注意力……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 只有意大利人亮出的枪口深处，能剥夺我的注意力……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciò che congelò il mio cuore fu la canna della pistola che il soldato italiano stava puntando...

Steam (ST): Tajima-kun's back burst once more as he leaned against me. Flesh tore, blood splattered. The warm splash of it covered my face.
Umineko Project (UP): Tajima‐kun's back burst once more as he leaned against me. Flesh tore, blood splattered. The warm splash of it covered my face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Tajima-kun's back burst once more as he leaned against me. Flesh tore, blood splattered. The warm splash of it covered my face.
PC Japanese (JP): 私にもたれかかる田島くんの背中が再び爆ぜる。肉が裂け、血飛沫が飛び散る。その熱い飛沫が私の顔を覆った。
Russian (RU): Когда Таджима прислонился ко мне, его спину прорвало ещё раз. Прорванная плоть, брызг крови. Моё лицо покрыл тёплый всплеск.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As costas do Tajima‐kun explodiram mais uma vez enquanto ele se apoiava em mim. A carne rompeu e seu sangue jorrou. Seu caloroso jato cobriu a minha face.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 倒在我身上的田島君的後背，再次開花。皮開肉綻，血沫飛濺。熱乎乎的飛沫，濺了我一臉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 倒在我身上的田岛君的后背，再次开花。皮开肉绽，血沫飞溅。热乎乎的飞沫，溅了我一脸。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La schiena di Tajima-kun esplose un'altra volta mentre si appoggiava su di me. La carne si strappò, il sangue schizzò. Il suo caldo spruzzo colpì la mia faccia.

Steam (ST): Was the Italian still trying to finish him off, even though he had stopped moving for good?
Umineko Project (UP): Was the Italian still trying to finish him off, even though he had stopped moving for good?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Was the Italian still trying to finish him off, even though he had stopped moving for good?
PC Japanese (JP): すでに身動きも叶わない彼にさらにとどめを？
Russian (RU): Итальянец до сих пор пытается прикончить его, даже если он уже перестал двигаться?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Estava o italiano ainda tentando acabar com ele, mesmo ele já tendo parado de se mover?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對已經連動都動不了的他，再來個最後一擊？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对已经连动都动不了的他，再来个最后一击？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'italiano stava ancora cercando di finirlo, nonostante avesse smesso di muoversi una volta per tutte?

Steam (ST): How foolish I've been... Can I still not understand the scene in front of me?!
Umineko Project (UP): How foolish I've been...... Can I still not understand the scene in front of me?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): How foolish I've been...... Can I still not understand the scene in front of me?!
PC Japanese (JP): あぁ、私は何と愚かなのか……。この期に及んでまだ、私は直面したるこの惨事を理解できないのか！
Russian (RU): Как же я глуп...... Я до сих пор не понимаю, в чём дело?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como pude ser tão idiota......? Eu ainda não conseguia entender a cena à minha frente?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 啊——，我是多麼的蠢啊……。都事到如今了，還無法理解我正直接面對著的這場慘劇嗎？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 啊——，我是多么的蠢啊……。都事到如今了，还无法理解我正直接面对着的这场惨剧吗？！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come sono stupido... non riesco ancora a capire la scena davanti ai miei occhi?!

Steam (ST): Rejoice, Kinzo!! Now you'll finally get what you've wanted all this time...!!
Umineko Project (UP): Rejoice, Kinzo!! Now you'll finally get what you've wanted all this time...!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): 喜べ、金蔵！！　私が望んだものが、今、初めて与えられたというのに…！！
Russian (RU): Радуйся, Кинзо! Сейчас ты наконец получишь то, что хотел всё это время!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Alegre‐se, Kinzo!! Agora você finalmente terá aquilo que desejou por toda sua vida...!!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 高興起來啊，金藏！！我明明是於此刻，首次被人給予了，我想要的東西啊…！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 高兴起来啊，金藏！！我明明是于此刻，首次被人给予了，我想要的东西啊…！！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gioisci, Kinzo!! Ora avrai finalmente ciò che hai desiderato per tutto questo tempo...!!

Steam (ST): The Italian hadn't fired to finish off Tajima-kun. He had been aiming at the man Tajima-kun had fallen on, ...me, Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Umineko Project (UP): The Italian hadn't fired to finish off Tajima‐kun. He had been aiming at the man Tajima‐kun had fallen on: me, Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Italian hadn't fired to finish off Tajima-kun. He had been aiming at the man Tajima-kun had fallen on...me, Ushiromiya Kinzo.
PC Japanese (JP): イタリア人はとどめを刺すために撃ったのではない。重なり合って倒れている、この、右代宮金蔵を狙って撃ったのだ。
Russian (RU): Итальянец выстрелил не для того, чтобы прикончить Таджиму. Он целился в человека, на которого тот упал... В меня, Уширомию Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O italiano não atirou para acabar com o Tajima‐kun. Ele estava mirando no homem sobre qual o Tajima‐kun caiu: eu, Ushiromiya Kinzo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 意大利人並不是為了給他來個最後一擊而開的槍。他是在朝，倒在他下面的，我，右代宮金藏開槍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 意大利人并不是为了给他来个最后一击而开的枪。他是在朝，倒在他下面的，我，右代宫金藏开枪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'italiano non aveva fatto fuoco per finire Tajima-kun. Stava mirando all'uomo su cui Tajima-kun era caduto... me, Ushiromiya Kinzo.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Uu...uuu...uwaah...!!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Uu... uuu... uwaah...!!!"

Steam (ST): I pushed his corpse aside, scrabbled against the floor, and dashed away, tumbling over myself.
Umineko Project (UP): I pushed his corpse aside, scrabbled against the floor, and dashed away, tumbling over myself.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 彼の死体を跳ね除け、私は床を掻きながら、転げるように走り出す。
Russian (RU): Я оттолкнул его труп, оцарапал пол и убежал, спотыкаясь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu empurrei seu corpo para o lado, me arranhei contra o chão e sai correndo, tropeçando em mim mesmo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 推開他的屍體，我胡亂抓著地面，連滾帶爬地逃跑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 推开他的尸体，我胡乱抓着地面，连滚带爬地逃跑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Spinsi il suo corpo da un lato, raschiai il pavimento, e corsi via, inciampando su me stesso.

Steam (ST): My hands had pushed off against the floor hard enough to tear off the ring finger fingernail on my left hand. When faced with death, humans truly can resist with all they've got.
Umineko Project (UP): My hands had pushed off against the floor hard enough to tear off the ring finger fingernail on my left hand.{n}When faced with death, humans truly can resist with all they've got.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): My hands had pushed off against the floor hard enough to tear off the ring finger fingernail on my left hand. When faced with death, humans truly can resist with all they've got.
PC Japanese (JP): 床を掻いた時、それだけのことで左手の薬指の爪が剥げた。どれだけ、人は死に対し、全身全霊で抗うというのか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 床を掻いた時、それだけのことで左手の薬指の爪が剥げた。{n}どれだけ、人は死に対し、全身全霊で抗うというのか。
Russian (RU): Я так сильно оттолкнулся от пола, что оторвал ноготь безымянного пальца на левой руке.{n}Смотря в лицо смерти, люди и вправду могут сопротивляться всеми силами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minhas mãos tinham empurrado o chão com tanta força ao ponto de arrancar a unha do dedo anelar da minha mão esquerda.{n}Quando se deparam com a morte, humanos realmente resistem com todas as suas forças.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在抓地面時，僅僅是這麼點小事，就把我左手無名指的指甲給剝落了。{n}這是代表著，人對死亡，是會盡全身心地反抗到這種地步的麼？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在抓地面时，仅仅是这么点小事，就把我左手无名指的指甲给剥落了。{n}这是代表着，人对死亡，是会尽全身心地反抗到这种地步的么？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le mie mani si erano spinte contro il pavimento così violentemente da strappare l'unghia dell'anulare della mano sinistra. Messi di fronte alla morte, gli umani possono davvero resistere con tutto ciò in loro possesso.

Steam (ST): I tumbled over and over as I ran, scraping up parts of my body. It was painful, hot. But that didn't matter at all!
Umineko Project (UP): I tumbled over and over as I ran, scraping up parts of my body. It was painful, hot. But that didn't matter at all!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I tumbled over and over as I ran, scraping up parts of my body. It was painful, hot. But that didn't matter at all!
PC Japanese (JP): 床を転げ、体を削り取りながら走る。痛かった、熱かった。でも、そんなことはどうでも良かった！
Russian (RU): Пока бежал, я раз за разом спотыкался, царапая всё тело. Было больно, горячо. Но это совсем не имело значения!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu tropecei várias vezes enquanto corria, arranhando várias partes do meu corpo. Foi doloroso e abafado. Mas nada disso importava!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 連滾帶爬，削皮磨肉地拚命逃跑。好痛，好燙。但是，這些根本無所謂！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 连滚带爬，削皮磨肉地拼命逃跑。好痛，好烫。但是，这些根本无所谓！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Correndo, inciampai molte volte, graffiando parti del mio corpo. Era doloroso, caldo. Ma non importava affatto!

Steam (ST): I heard the yelling in Italian come from behind me over and over again. It felt like they were running, chasing after me.
Umineko Project (UP): I heard the yelling in Italian come from behind me over and over again. It felt like they were running, chasing after me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 後ろからイタリア語の怒鳴り声が何度も聞こえた。それが走り、自分を追ってくるように感じられた。
Russian (RU): Я снова и снова слышал за собой крики на итальянском. Казалось, они бежали, преследовали меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu ouvi os gritos em italiano vindo atrás de mim sem parar. Eu senti que eles estavam correndo, me perseguindo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從身後，一遍又一遍地傳來意大利語的怒吼聲。我感到，怒吼聲正奔跑著，正追趕著自己。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从身后，一遍又一遍地传来意大利语的怒吼声。我感到，怒吼声正奔跑着，正追赶着自己。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sentii il grido in italiano venire più volte da dietro di me. Sembrava come se stesse correndo, cercando di catturarmi.

Steam (ST): I didn't want to look back. So I kept on running and running, as though the Italians were right behind me.
Umineko Project (UP): I didn't want to look back. So I kept on running and running, as though the Italians were right behind me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I didn't want to look back. So I kept on running and running, as though the Italians were right behind me.
PC Japanese (JP): 振り返りたくもなかった。だからずっとイタリア人が追ってきているように思えて、どこまでも滅茶苦茶に、ぐちゃぐちゃに逃げた。
Russian (RU): Я не хотел оборачиваться, поэтому продолжал бежать и бежать, словно итальянцы были у меня за спиной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não queria olhar para trás. Por isso, continuei correndo e correndo, como se os italianos estivessem bem atrás de mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不敢回頭。所以，我一直以為意大利人在追我，無目的地，胡亂地瞎跑。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不敢回头。所以，我一直以为意大利人在追我，无目的地，胡乱地瞎跑。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non volevo voltarmi. Perciò continuai a correre e a correre, come se gli italiani fossero dietro di me.

Steam (ST): This is...death...!! Didn't you want to die?
Umineko Project (UP): This......is death......!!{n}Didn't you want to die?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This is......death...!! Didn't you want to die?
PC Japanese (JP): これが、……死……！！死にたかったんじゃないのか？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): これが、……死……！！{n}死にたかったんじゃないのか？
Russian (RU): Вот...... смерть!..{n}Разве ты не хотел умереть?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso......é a morte......!!{n}Você não quer morrer?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這就是，……死……！！{n}我不是想死嗎？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这就是，……死……！！{n}我不是想死吗？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questa è... la morte...!! Non volevi morire?

Steam (ST): No, I don't want to die!!
Umineko Project (UP): No, I don't want to die!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): 嫌だ、死にたくないッ！！
Russian (RU): Нет, я не хочу умирать!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, eu não quero morrer!!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不要，我不想死！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No, non voglio morire!!

Steam (ST): Why? Didn't I want to die so badly? But now, I know. I know how wonderful it is to be alive.
Umineko Project (UP): Why? Didn't I want to die so badly?{n}But now, I know.{n}I know how wonderful it is to be alive.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Why? Didn't I want to die so badly? But now, I know. I know how wonderful it is to be alive.
PC Japanese (JP): どうして？　あんなにも望んだのに？私はもう、知ってしまった。生きることの、素晴らしさを。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): どうして？　あんなにも望んだのに？{n}私はもう、知ってしまった。{n}生きることの、素晴らしさを。
Russian (RU): Почему? Я же так отчаянно хотел умереть.{n}Но теперь я знаю.{n}Я знаю, как прекрасно жить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por quê? Eu não queria tanto morrer?{n}Mas agora eu sei.{n}Eu sei o quão maravilhoso é estar vivo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為什麼？明明渴望到了那種地步？{n}我已經，明白了。{n}活著，是有多麼美妙。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为什么？明明渴望到了那种地步？{n}我已经，明白了。{n}活着，是有多么美妙。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché? Nonostante volessi morire così tanto? Ma ora, lo so. So quanto sia bello essere vivi.

Steam (ST): She taught me. Bice did.
Umineko Project (UP): She taught me. Bice did.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She taught me. Bice did.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女が教えてくれた。ビーチェが教えてくれた。
Russian (RU): Она показала мне. Биче показала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela me ensinou. A Bice.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是她教我明白的。是碧切教我明白的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Me l'ha insegnato lei. Bice.

Steam (ST): I can only be free when I talk with her. No! By talking with her, I finally came alive for the first time. I was born!!
Umineko Project (UP): I can only be free when I talk with her. No!{n}By talking with her, I was finally alive for the first time. I was finally born!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I can only be free when I talk with her. No! By talking with her, I was finally alive for the first time. I was born!!
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女と話している時だけ解放された。違う！彼女と話して、私は初めて生きたのだ。生まれたのだ！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 彼女と話している時だけ解放された。違う！{n}彼女と話して、私は初めて生きたのだ。生まれたのだ！！
Russian (RU): Я могу быть свободен только когда говорю с ней. Нет!{n}Разговаривая с ней, я впервые по‐настоящему жил. Я родился!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu só posso ser livre quando converso com ela. Não!{n}Ao falar com ela, eu finalmente fui capaz de viver pela primeira vez.{n}Eu finalmente nasci!!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 唯獨與她說話時，我能獲得解放。不對！{n}通過與她說話，我首次獲生。首次降生！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 唯独与她说话时，我能获得解放。不对！{n}通过与她说话，我首次获生。首次降生！！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Posso essere libero solo quando parlo con lei. No! Parlando con lei, vissi finalmente per la prima volta. Io nacqui!!

Steam (ST): I want to live. I want to live, I want to live, I want to live!! I don't want to die!
Umineko Project (UP): I want to live. I want to live, I want to live, I want to live!! I don't want to die!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=ST]
PC Japanese (JP): 生きたいッ。生きたい生きたい生きたいッ！！　死にたくない！！
Russian (RU): Я хочу жить. Я хочу жить, я хочу жить, я хочу жить! Я не хочу умирать!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu quero viver. Eu quero viver, eu quero viver, eu quero viver!! Eu não quero morrer!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 好想活。好想活好想活好想活！！不想死！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Voglio vivere. Voglio vivere, voglio vivere, voglio vivere!! Non voglio morire!

Steam (ST): I want to live and see her, right now!! If I don't see her, I'll die! I'll be killed!!
Umineko Project (UP): I want to live and see her, right now!! If I don't see her, I'll die! I'll be killed!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 生きて彼女と会いたい、今すぐに！！　会わなきゃ死ぬ、殺される！！
Russian (RU): Я хочу выжить и сейчас же увидеть её! Не увидев её, я умру! Я буду убит!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu quero viver e ver ela agora!! Se eu não vê‐la, eu vou morrer! Eu serei morto!!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 好想活著見她，現在就想！！見不到她，我就會死去，會被殺！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 好想活着见她，现在就想！！见不到她，我就会死去，会被杀！！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Voglio vivere e vederla, adesso!! Se non la vedo, morirò! Mi uccideranno!!

Steam (ST): ...Stay cool, Kinzo. ...She might be killed too...!
Umineko Project (UP): .........Stay cool, Kinzo. ......She might be killed too...!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Stay cool, Kinzo. ......She might be killed too...!
PC Japanese (JP): ………落ち着け金蔵、……彼女だって殺されるかもしれない…！
Russian (RU): ......Сохраняй спокойствие, Кинзо. ......Её тоже могут убить!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Fique calmo, Kinzo. ......Ela também pode ser morta...!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………鎮靜點金藏，……她不也有可能已經被殺了嘛…？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………镇静点金藏，……她不也有可能已经被杀了嘛…？！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Rimani calmo, Kinzo. ... Potrebbero uccidere anche lei...!

Steam (ST): If you live and she dies, you might as well be dead...!!
Umineko Project (UP): If you live and she dies, you might as well be dead......!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If you live and she dies, you might as well be dead......!!
PC Japanese (JP): 自分が生きても、彼女が殺されたら、それは同じことなんだ……！！
Russian (RU): Если ты выживешь, а она умрёт, то умрёшь и ты!..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se você viver e ela morrer, você também vai morrer......!!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就算自己倖存，但她要是被殺了，那這就完全一樣了……！！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就算自己幸存，但她要是被杀了，那这就完全一样了……！！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se vivi ma lei muore, potresti benissimo morire anche tu...!!

Steam (ST): Before I knew it, my face was covered in tears, snot, and saliva.
Umineko Project (UP): Before I knew it, my face was covered in tears, snot, and drool.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 気付けば顔は、涙と鼻水と涎でぐちゃぐちゃに歪んでいた。
Russian (RU): Не успел я осознать, как всё моё лицо оказалось в слезах, соплях и слюнях.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Antes que eu percebesse, meu rosto estava coberto por lágrimas, muco e saliva.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 等回過神來時，自己的臉已被淚水、鼻涕、口水搞得一塌糊塗。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 等回过神来时，自己的脸已被泪水、鼻涕、口水搞得一塌糊涂。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Prima di rendermene conto, il mio viso si ricoprì di lacrime, moccio e bava.

Steam (ST): When I stumbled into something and fell, I was finally able to come to my senses a little.
Umineko Project (UP): When I stumbled over something and fell, I was finally able to come to my senses a little.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When I stumbled into something and fell, I was finally able to come to my senses a little.

Steam (ST): ...Bice. ...Are you...okay...?

Umineko Project (UP): I'll find her and take her to a safe place. ......The lieutenant will probably kill all of the Italians to steal the gold. Bice probably won't be an exception.

Steam (ST): I lived for the first time after meeting you. I was born. So if you die, I'll die again.
Umineko Project (UP): Meeting you was the first time I ever lived, the first time I was ever born. So if you die, I'll die again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I lived for the first time after meeting you. I was born. So if you die, I'll die again.
PC Japanese (JP): 君に会って私は初めて生きた。生まれた。ならば私は君が死ねば再び死ぬ。
Russian (RU): Встретив тебя, я впервые зажил. Я родился. И если ты умрёшь, я умру снова.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Encontrá‐la me permitiu viver pela primeira vez, a primeira vez em que nasci. Se você morrer, eu morro de novo.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 通过遇见你，我首次获生。首次降生。那么，如果你死了，我就将再次死去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ho vissuto per la prima volta incontrandoti. Sono nato. Perciò se tu muori, io morirò nuovamente.

Steam (ST): I could feel every cell in my body being reborn, not as Ushiromiya Kinzo, ...but as a completely different Kinzo.
Umineko Project (UP): I could feel every cell in my body being reborn, not as Ushiromiya Kinzo, ......but as a completely different Kinzo.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I could feel every cell in my body being reborn, not as Ushiromiya Kinzo, ......but as a completely different Kinzo.

Russian (RU): Я чувствовал, что возрождается каждая клеточка моего тела, и уже не как Уширомия Кинзо...... а как совершенно другой Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu pude sentir cada célula do meu corpo renascendo, não como Ushiromiya Kinzo, ......mas como um Kinzo completamente diferente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我感到全身的細胞，全都重生為了並非右代宮金藏的，……完全不同的，另一個金藏。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我感到全身的细胞，全都重生为了并非右代宫金藏的，……完全不同的，另一个金藏。

Umineko Project (UP): ......Of course, I was terrified that I might really be shot if I went back.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......É claro, eu estava aterrorizado porque poderia levar um tiro se voltasse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……當然我心中有在害怕，如果重新回去，那這次就說不定會中槍了。

Steam (ST): But I didn't want to die anymore. To truly die. So, I was able to overcome my fear.
Umineko Project (UP): But I no longer wanted to die, in the truest possible sense. So, I was able to overcome my fear.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But I didn't want to die anymore. To truly die. So, I was able to overcome my fear.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas eu não queria mais morrer, no mais verdadeiro sentido possível. Assim, eu fui capaz de superar o meu medo.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，我已经不想死了。在真正意义上地不想死。所以，我能够歪曲这份恐惧。

Steam (ST): Rubens stood with Beatrice behind his back and neatly shot the two men rushing at him with two 9mm bullets from his Beretta M1934.
Umineko Project (UP): Rubens stood with Beatrice behind his back and neatly shot the two men rushing at him with two 9mm bullets from his Beretta M1934.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rubens stood with Beatrice behind his back and neatly shot the two men rushing at him with 2 9mm bullets from his Beretta M1934.
PC Japanese (JP): ルーベンスはベアトリーチェを背中で庇い、ベレッタＭ１９３４の９ｍｍ弾を正確に１発ずつ、飛び込んできた２人に撃ち込む。
Russian (RU): Рубенс с Беатриче за спиной аккуратно застрелил двух мужчин, побежавших на него, двумя 9‐миллиметровыми пулями из своей Беретты М1934.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rubens permaneceu com Beatrice atrás de suas costas e fez um disparo perfeito contra dois homens correndo em sua direção, com duas 9mm de sua Beretta M1934.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魯本斯把貝阿朵莉切護在背後，將伯萊塔 M1934 的 9mm 子彈，一人一發，準確命中了衝過來的兩人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 鲁本斯把贝阿朵莉切护在背后，将伯莱塔 M1934 的 9mm 子弹，一人一发，准确命中了冲过来的两人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rubens stava in piedi, con Beatrice dietro la sua schiena, e colpì con precisione i due uomini che lo stavano assalendo con due proiettili da 9mm dalla sua Beretta M1934.

Steam (ST): However, one of the 8mm bullets from their Type 94 semi-auto pistols went straight into Rubens' chest.
Umineko Project (UP): However, one of the 8mm bullets from their Type 94 semi‐auto pistols went straight into Rubens's chest.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, one of the 8mm bullets from their Type 94 semi-auto pistols went straight into Rubens's chest.
