Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「早知這樣，一開始就把這女人抓起來當人質就好了。媽的，好一幫可憎的傢伙！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「早知这样，一开始就把这女人抓起来当人质就好了。妈的，好一帮可憎的家伙！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se in ogni caso sarebbe finita così, avremmo dovuto prendere questa donna come ostaggio sin dall'inizio. Irritanti, ecco cosa sono!"

Steam (ST): Yamamoto spat. Beatrice used that moment to snatch up Rubens' gun.
Umineko Project (UP): Yamamoto spat. Beatrice used that moment to snatch up Rubens's gun.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 山本は唾を吐き捨てる。その隙をついてベアトリーチェは素早くルーベンスの銃を拾う。
Russian (RU): Ямамото сплюнул. Беатриче воспользовалась моментом, чтобы схватить пистолет Рубенса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Yamamoto cuspiu. Beatrice usou esse instante para pegar a arma de Rubens.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 山本吐了口口水。貝阿朵莉切趁著這個空當，迅速撿起了魯本斯的槍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 山本吐了口口水。贝阿朵莉切趁着这个空当，迅速捡起了鲁本斯的枪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Yamamoto sputò. Beatrice sfruttò quel momento per rubare l'arma di Rubens.

Speaker: Beatrice
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): "Well look at you, reaching to pick up a gun without missing a beat! Italian women sure are scary! Dammit, both of you screwed up...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Oh, picking up a gun without hesitation! Italian women sure are scary! Dammit, you both managed to screw up...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Oh, picking up a gun without hesitation! Italian women sure are scary! Dammit, both of you screwed up...!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「躊躇なく銃を拾おうとするとは！　イタリア女は実に物騒だッ！　クソ、二人掛りでしくじりやがって…！！」
Russian (RU): "О, без колебаний взяла в руки пистолет! Итальянки и впрямь опасный народ! Чёрт возьми, вы оба облажались!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pegando uma arma de fogo sem nem hesitar, é?! As italianas são mesmo assustadoras! Merda, vocês estragaram tudo...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「竟會毫不猶豫地撿槍！意大利婆娘真是危險呢！媽的，兩個一起上還失手…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「竟会毫不犹豫地捡枪！意大利婆娘真是危险呢！妈的，两个一起上还失手…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Oh, prendere un'arma senza esitare...! Le donne italiane sono davvero spaventose! Merda, siete messi male...!!"

Steam (ST): He spat this last part at the two dying men who lay moaning at his feet.
Umineko Project (UP): He spat this last part at the two dying men who lay moaning at his feet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 足元に転がり、苦しそうに呻いて最期の時を待つ二人に、憎々しげにそう言い放つ。
Russian (RU): Он выпалил последнее двум умирающим мужчинам, стонущим у его ног.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele cuspiu esta última parte nos dois homens que estavam caídos e gemendo aos seus pés.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他朝倒在腳邊痛苦呻吟，等待著最後一刻的兩人，惡狠狠地放出此言。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他朝倒在脚边痛苦呻吟，等待着最后一刻的两人，恶狠狠地放出此言。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sputò quest'ultima parte ai due uomini morenti che giacevano gemendo sul pavimento.

Steam (ST): However, what had happened to them wasn't particularly surprising. It wasn't the first time it had happened either.
Umineko Project (UP): However, it wasn't particularly surprising. And this wasn't the only place it was happening.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, it wasn't particularly surprising. And, this wasn't the first time it had happened.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、無理もないことだった。そしてそれは、ここの撃ち合いだけではない。
Russian (RU): Но в этом не было ничего удивительного. И это уже не первый случай.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, não foi algo surpreendente. E este não era o único lugar onde isso estava acontecendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，這也難免。其次，這話並不僅僅是指此處的這場槍戰。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，这也难免。其次，这话并不仅仅是指此处的这场枪战。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, non era particolarmente sorprendente. E non era la prima volta che succedeva.

Steam (ST): In this tiny, cramped tunnel, nearly everyone had met head on. When both sides shot recklessly in such a situation, the result was two corpses.
Umineko Project (UP): Nearly everyone met head on in these tiny, cramped tunnels. When both sides shot recklessly in a situation like that, the result was two corpses.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In this tiny, cramped tunnel, nearly everyone had met head on. When both sides shot recklessly in this situation, the result was two corpses.
PC Japanese (JP): この、狭く入り組んだ壕内では、ほとんどが出会い頭となる。互いに銃弾を無闇やたらに撃ち込み合えば、転がる骸は二つになる。
Russian (RU): В этом крошечном, тесном туннеле почти все встречались лоб в лоб. Когда обе стороны опрометчиво стреляют в такой ситуации, результат — два трупа.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Praticamente todos bateram de frente dentro desses pequenos e apertados túneis. Quando ambos os lados atiram imprudentemente em uma situação assim, o resultado são dois cadáveres.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這又窄又錯綜複雜的戰壕內，撞見人時幾乎全是迎面相見。而此時，若是朝彼此舉槍就是一梭子子彈的話，那倒下的屍骸就准是兩具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这又窄又错综复杂的战壕内，撞见人时几乎全是迎面相见。而此时，若是朝彼此举枪就是一梭子子弹的话，那倒下的尸骸就准是两具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In questo minuscolo, angusto tunnel, quasi tutti si erano incontrati. In questa situazione, quando entrambi sparano con imprudenza, si finisce per avere due cadaveri.

Steam (ST): So, whoever sensed another person and pulled the trigger quickest "won". That was the only way to survive this battle without a bullet in your chest.
Umineko Project (UP): So the way to be fastest was to pull the trigger immediately the moment you sensed another person. That was the only way to make it through this battle without ending up with a bullet in your chest.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, whoever sensed another person and pulled the trigger quickest 'won'. That was the only way to survive this battle without a bullet in your chest.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、人の気配さえ感じたら直ちに引き金を引いた方が早い。それが唯一、自分の胸に鉛弾を喰らわない生き残りの方法だ。
Russian (RU): Поэтому тот, кто заметил другого и нажал на курок быстрее, 'победил'. Только так можно было выжить в этой бойне, не получив пулю в грудь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, o jeito era ser o mais rápido a puxar o gatilho no momento em que sentisse outra pessoa. Esse era a única maneira de atravessar essa batalha sem acabar com uma bala no seu peito.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以還不如，一感受到人的動靜，就直接扣下扳機。這是唯一能令自己胸膛不用吃鉛彈，能令自己倖存下來的方法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以还不如，一感受到人的动静，就直接扣下扳机。这是唯一能令自己胸膛不用吃铅弹，能令自己幸存下来的方法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò, chiunque percepisse un'altra persona e premesse il grilletto per primo avrebbe ‘vinto’. Questo era l'unico modo per sopravvivere in questa battaglia senza ritrovarsi un proiettile nel petto.

Steam (ST): Because of this, both Japanese and Italians had killed each other without hesitation, and they sometimes even pulled the trigger on oncoming allies.
Umineko Project (UP): Because of this, both Japanese and Italians killed each other without hesitation, and they sometimes even pulled the trigger on their own countrymen when they unexpectedly ran into each other.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because of this, both Japanese and Italians had killed each other without hesitation, and they sometimes even pulled the trigger on oncoming allies.
PC Japanese (JP): そんなだから、日本人もイタリア人も、異邦人を容赦なく殺したし、時に出会い頭の同胞にさえ引き金を引いた。
Russian (RU): Из‐за этого и японцы, и итальянцы убивали друг друга без колебаний, а иногда даже стреляли во встречных союзников.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por causa disso, tanto os japoneses quanto os italianos se mataram sem hesitar, algumas vezes puxando o gatilho contra seus próprios companheiros quando acabavam se encontrando de maneira inesperada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 正因如此，日本人也好意大利人也罷，都能毫不留情地殺死異邦人，有時甚至還會對迎面撞見的同胞扣下扳機。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 正因如此，日本人也好意大利人也罢，都能毫不留情地杀死异邦人，有时甚至还会对迎面撞见的同胞扣下扳机。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per questo, sia i giapponesi che gli italiani avevano ucciso gli uni gli altri senza esitazione, e talvolta avevano premuto il grilletto persino verso gli alleati provenienti dalla parte opposta.

Steam (ST): In the midst of all this were several Japanese men who had stumbled into the fight, wondering what was going on.
Umineko Project (UP): And in the midst of all this, large numbers of Japanese men who had no idea what was going on ran towards the noise and became victims one after another.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In the midst of all this were several Japanese men who had stumbled into the fight, wondering what was going on.
PC Japanese (JP): そんな中に、何事か何事かと、突然の騒ぎに駆けつけた大勢の日本人たちは次々に巻き込まれていった。
Russian (RU): В разгар всего этого объявлялось несколько японцев, наткнувшихся на бой, интересуясь, что происходит.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E, no meio de tudo isso, um grande número de japoneses que não faziam ideia do que estava acontecendo correram na direção do baralho e se tornaram vítimas, um após o outro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這場大亂中，有許許多多想著“出什麼事了、出什麼事了”，因突然的騷動而跑來的日本人，一個接一個地受到了連累。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这场大乱中，有许许多多想着“出什么事了、出什么事了”，因突然的骚动而跑来的日本人，一个接一个地受到了连累。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nel bel mezzo di tutto ciò vi erano uomini giapponesi che erano capitati nel combattimento chiedendosi cosa stesse succedendo.

Steam (ST): It didn't matter whether the other person was holding a gun or not.
Umineko Project (UP): It didn't matter whether the other person was holding a gun or not.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It didn't matter whether the other person was holding a gun or not.
PC Japanese (JP): 相手が銃を持っていようと持っていまいと関係ない。
Russian (RU): Неважно, держал ли другой пистолет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não importava se a outra pessoa estava portando uma arma ou não.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 無關對方有沒有拿槍。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 无关对方有没有拿枪。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non importava se l'altra persona avesse una pistola o meno.

Steam (ST): Everyone had reflexively pulled the trigger at the sight of anyone other than themselves, trying to stay alive.
Umineko Project (UP): Everyone reflexively pulled the trigger at the sight of anyone other than themselves, trying to stay alive.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Everyone had reflexively pulled the trigger at the sight of anyone other than themselves, trying to stay alive.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分が生きるために自分以外の人影に対し、反射的に引き金を引く。
Russian (RU): Все рефлекторно нажимали на курок при виде кого‐либо, кроме себя, пытаясь остаться в живых.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Todos puxaram seus gatilhos reflexivamente no momento em que viam qualquer outra pessoa que não fosse eles próprios, tentando permanecerem vivos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 為了令自己活下去，對除自己外的任何人影，條件反射地扣下扳機。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 为了令自己活下去，对除自己外的任何人影，条件反射地扣下扳机。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ognuno aveva premuto riflessivamente il grilletto alla vista di chiunque a parte se stessi, tentando di rimanere vivi.

Steam (ST): The entire base had been wrapped up in this slaughter...
Umineko Project (UP): The slaughter engulfed the entire base......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The entire base had been wrapped up in this slaughter......
PC Japanese (JP): そんな殺戮が、基地内を飲み込んでいった……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そんな殺人劇が、基地内を飲み込んでいった……。
Russian (RU): Эта бойня разошлась по всей базе......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A chacina tomou conta de toda a base......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這種殺戮，吞噬了基地內的每一處……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这种杀戮，吞噬了基地内的每一处……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'intera base era stata avvolta in questo massacro...

Steam (ST): There was a fierce gun battle taking place on the submarine dock. And a massacre resembling a hunt was taking place inside the base.
Umineko Project (UP): There was a fierce gun battle taking place in the submarine dock. And a massacre resembling a hunt was taking place inside the base.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There was a fierce gun battle taking place in the submarine dock. And a massacre resembling a hunt was taking place inside the base.
PC Japanese (JP): 潜水艦ドックでは激しい銃撃戦が。そして基地内では狩猟のような虐殺が繰り広げられた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 潜水艦ドックでは激しい銃撃戦が。そして基地内では狩猟のような惨劇が繰り広げられた。
Russian (RU): Ожесточённая перестрелка велась в доке субмарин. И бойня напоминала охоту внутри базы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Havia uma feroz troca de tiros ocorrendo na doca do submarino. E um massacre similar a uma caça, estava ocorrendo dentro da base.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在潛水艇船塢展開著激烈的槍戰。而在基地內，卻反覆蔓延著如狩獵般的虐殺。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在潜水艇船坞展开着激烈的枪战。而在基地内，却反复蔓延着如狩猎般的虐杀。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ci fu una violenta sparatoria nel molo del sottomarino. E dentro la base stava accadendo un massacro simile ad una battuta di caccia.

Steam (ST): Most of the non-combatants assigned to this base were killed before they knew what was going on.
Umineko Project (UP): Most of the non‐combatants assigned to this base were killed before they knew what was going on.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Most of the non-combatants assigned to this base were killed before they knew what was going on.
PC Japanese (JP): 軍属の非戦闘員のほとんどは、何事かもわからない内に撃ち殺された。
Russian (RU): Большинство нонкомбатантов, определённых в эту базу, убили до того, как они осознали происходящее.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A grande maioria dos não‐combatentes designados para esta base foram mortos antes mesmo de entenderem o que estava acontecendo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 軍屬的非戰鬥人員，絕大多數都還什麼都不知道呢，就被槍殺了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 军属的非战斗人员，绝大多数都还什么都不知道呢，就被枪杀了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La maggior parte dei non-combattenti assegnati a questa base vennero uccisi prima che venissero a conoscenza di cosa stava succedendo.

Steam (ST): The Italians were indeed quite seasoned troops, but their numbers began to drop bit by bit.
Umineko Project (UP): The Italians were indeed quite seasoned troops, but their numbers began to drop bit by bit.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The Italians were indeed quite seasoned troops, but their numbers began to drop bit by bit.
PC Japanese (JP): イタリア人は確かに精兵揃いだったが、少しずつ犠牲者を増やしていった。
Russian (RU): Да, итальянцы были опытными солдатами, но постепенно их становилось всё меньше.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os italianos eram realmente soldados experientes, mas seus números começaram a diminuir pouco a pouco.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然意大利人的確是精兵齊集，但他們中也漸漸出現了更多的犧牲者。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然意大利人的确是精兵齐集，但他们中也渐渐出现了更多的牺牲者。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gli italiani erano delle truppe davvero esperte, ma il loro numero iniziava a calare poco a poco.

Steam (ST): Bloodstained corpses were scattered everywhere...
Umineko Project (UP): Blood‐stained corpses lay scattered all across the base......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Blood-stained corpses were scattered all across the base......
PC Japanese (JP): 基地内のそこかしこに、血塗れの死体がごろごろと横たわった……。
Russian (RU): По всей базе валялись окровавленные трупы......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Cadáveres manchados de sangue estavam caídos por toda base......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 基地內這裡那裡，到處都倒著渾身是血的屍體……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 基地内这里那里，到处都倒着浑身是血的尸体……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Cadaveri macchiati di sangue erano sparsi per tutta la base...

Steam (ST): At first, it had probably been a proper gunfight.
Umineko Project (UP): At first, it had probably been a proper gunfight.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At first, it had probably been a proper gunfight.
PC Japanese (JP): 最初は、少なくとも彼らなりに意味のある銃撃戦だったかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Началось с оправданной перестрелки.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No começo, provavelmente foi mesmo uma troca de tiros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在最開始時，這至少對他們來說是場有意義的槍戰吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在最开始时，这至少对他们来说是场有意义的枪战吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): All'inizio, doveva essersi trattata di una sparatoria vera e propria.

Steam (ST): However, as their minds began to grow weary and numb, it devolved into that most basic cause of wars throughout humanity, the desire to kill all foreigners you don't understand...
Umineko Project (UP): However, as they gradually became desensitized, it devolved into that most basic cause of wars throughout humanity, the desire to kill all foreigners you don't understand...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, as their minds began to grow weary and numb, it devolved into that most basic cause of wars throughout humanity, the desire to kill all foreigners you don't understand...
PC Japanese (JP): しかし次第に、彼らの感覚は麻痺し、理解できぬ異邦人は全て殺せという、人類が戦争を起こす理由の、最も根源的なものにすり替わっていった…。
Russian (RU): Но постепенно их чувства парализовались, и проявилась основная причина войн по всему человечеству — желание убить всех иностранцев, которых не понимаешь...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, gradualmente foi se dessensibilizando, desenvolvendo‐se na mais básica causa das guerras da humanidade: o desejo de matar todos os estrangeiros que você não conseguisse entender...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是漸漸地，他們變得麻木不仁，槍戰的意義被替換成了，叫囂著“殺死所有無法理解的異邦人”的，人類挑起戰爭的理由中的，最最根源之物…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是渐渐地，他们变得麻木不仁，枪战的意义被替换成了，叫嚣着“杀死所有无法理解的异邦人”的，人类挑起战争的理由中的，最最根源之物…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, come le loro menti cominciavano a diventare stanche e insensibili, si evolse nella causa più basilare delle guerre nell'umanità, il desiderio di uccidere tutti gli incomprensibili stranieri...

Steam (ST): Whenever they heard words they didn't understand, they pulled the trigger. By that point, the screams of foreigners sounded no different from those of man-shaped beasts. After all, they couldn't understand pleading in another language.
Umineko Project (UP): Whenever they heard words they didn't understand, they pulled the trigger. By that point, the screams of foreigners sounded no different from those of man‐shaped beasts. After all, they couldn't understand pleading in another language.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Whenever they heard words they didn't understand, they pulled the trigger. By that point, the screams of foreigners sounded no different from those of man-shaped beasts. After all, they couldn't understand pleading in another language.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分に理解できない言葉を聞けば、構わず引き金を引いた。異邦人の悲鳴はもはや、人型のケモノのそれと同じに聞こえた。異国の言葉の命乞いなど、理解も出来ないのだから。
Russian (RU): Они нажимали на курок всякий раз, когда слышали непонятные слова. К этому времени крики иностранцев уже перестали отличаться от криков человекоподобных зверей. В конце концов, они не понимали мольбу на другом языке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Toda vez que ouviam palavras que não conseguiam compreender, eles puxavam o gatilho. Nesse ponto, os gritos dos estrangeiros não se diferenciavam daquelas bestas em forma de homens. Afinal, eles não conseguiam entender súplicas em outra língua.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一聽到自己無法理解的語言，就毫不介懷地扣下扳機。異邦人的慘叫聲，聽起來已等同於人型野獸的獸鳴。畢竟，用異國語言說的饒命根本無從理解。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一听到自己无法理解的语言，就毫不介怀地扣下扳机。异邦人的惨叫声，听起来已等同于人型野兽的兽鸣。毕竟，用异国语言说的饶命根本无从理解。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non appena sentivano parole che non comprendevano, premevano il grilletto. {n}A quel punto, le urla degli stranieri non sembravano differenti da quelle di bestie dalla forma umana. Dopotutto, non potevano capire le suppliche in un'altra lingua.

Steam (ST): So, it had long ago turned into a mere massacre...
Umineko Project (UP): So, it had long ago turned into a mere massacre......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, it had long ago turned into a mere massacre......
PC Japanese (JP): だからそれはもうとっくに、ただの殺戮と成り果てていたのだ……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だからそれはもうとっくに、ただの殺人劇と成り果てていたのだ……。
Russian (RU): Поэтому это уже давно превратилось в простую бойню......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, já havia se tornado um simples massacre......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以這事早已成為了，單純的殺戮……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以这事早已成为了，单纯的杀戮……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perciò, si era tramutato da molto tempo in un massacro...

Steam (ST): As the number of dead surpassed the number of living, ...silence began to return to the base.
Umineko Project (UP): As the number of dead surpassed the number of living, ......silence began to return to the base.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the number of dead surpassed the number of living, ......silence began to return to the base.
PC Japanese (JP): そうして死者の数が生きた人間を上回り、……次第に基地内は静寂を取り戻していった。
Russian (RU): Когда число мёртвых превысило число живых...... на базе снова повисла тишина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com o número de mortos ultrapassando o número de vivos, ......o silêncio começou a retornar à base.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就像這樣，死者的數量超過生者，……基地內部，漸漸地重歸寂靜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就像这样，死者的数量超过生者，……基地内部，渐渐地重归寂静。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come il numero dei morti superava quello dei vivi... il silenzio cominciò a tornare alla base.

Steam (ST): Just when it felt as though everyone had died, and you could hear the desolate sound of the wind blowing through the caves, there would be a sudden scream, the crisp sound of a gun, and you'd remember that the massacre wasn't yet over.
Umineko Project (UP): Just when it felt as though everyone had died and the desolate sound of the wind blew through the caves, there would be a sudden scream, the crisp sound of a gun, and one would remember that the massacre still wasn't over.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just when it felt as though everyone had died and the desolate sound of the wind blew through the caves, there would be a sudden scream, the crisp sound of a gun, and one would remember that the massacre wasn't yet over.
PC Japanese (JP): 荒涼とした風の音が聞こえ、全ての人間が死に絶えたかと思った頃に、唐突に悲鳴が聞こえては、乾いた銃声が、まだ殺戮が終わっていないことを思い出させる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 荒涼とした風の音が聞こえ、全ての人間が死に絶えたかと思った頃に、唐突に悲鳴が聞こえては、乾いた銃声が、まだ惨劇が終わっていないことを思い出させる。
Russian (RU): Только казалось, что все умерли, и по пещере проносился одинокий ветер, как вдруг раздавался крик вместе с чётким звуком выстрела, напоминая, что бойня ещё не окончена.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando pareceu que todos haviam morrido e o desolado som do vento passou a soprar pelas cavernas, ouviu‐se um grito repentino, o nítido som de uma arma, um lembrete de que aquele massacre ainda não havia terminado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在聽到荒涼的風聲，正以為所有人類全都死絕時，突然響起一聲慘叫，清脆的槍聲令人想起了，殺戮還未結束。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在听到荒凉的风声，正以为所有人类全都死绝时，突然响起一声惨叫，清脆的枪声令人想起了，杀戮还未结束。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Proprio quando sembrava che tutti fossero morti e il rumore desolato del vento percorreva le grotte, avrebbero risuonato un urlo improvviso e l'acre rumore di una pistola, e tutti si sarebbero ricordati che il massacro non era ancora finito.

Steam (ST): This happened...over and over again, ...and eventually, true silence fell.
Umineko Project (UP): This happened...over and over again.........until eventually, true silence fell.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This happened...over and over again.........and eventually, true silence fell.
PC Japanese (JP): そんなことが、何度も繰り返し、………やがて、本当の静寂を迎えた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そんなことが、何度も繰り返し、………やがて、本当の静寂を迎えた。
Russian (RU): Это происходило... снова и снова......... и в конце концов наступила истинная тишина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso aconteceu...de novo e de novo.........até que, eventualmente, restou apenas o verdadeiro silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這兩種聲音，反覆響起了好幾次，………過了一會兒，此處迎來了真正的靜寂。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这两种声音，反复响起了好几次，………过了一会儿，此处迎来了真正的静寂。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo successe... più e più volte... e alla fine, cadde il vero silenzio.

Steam (ST): ...It marked the pitiful end for those led astray by gold.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It marked the pitiful end for those led astray by gold.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……黄金の惑わされた者たちの、哀れな最期だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……黄金に惑わされた者たちの、哀れな最期だった。
Russian (RU): ......Ознаменование жалкого конца тех, кого золото ввело в заблуждение.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ele marcou o lamentável fim para aqueles que foram desviados de seu caminho pelo ouro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……而這正是，被黃金鬼迷心竅的人們的，可悲的下場。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……而这正是，被黄金鬼迷心窍的人们的，可悲的下场。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ciò segnò la pietosa fine per coloro traviati dall'oro.

Steam (ST): The leader of the Italian soldiers, Angelo, had managed to survive somehow.
Umineko Project (UP): The leader of the Italian soldiers, Angelo, had managed to survive somehow.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The leader of the Italian soldiers, Angelo, had managed to survive somehow.
PC Japanese (JP): イタリア人たちの指揮官、アンジェロは、何とか生き残っていた。
Russian (RU): Лидеру итальянских солдат, Анджело, кое‐как удалось выжить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O líder dos soldados italianos, Angelo, deu um jeito de sobreviver de alguma forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 意大利人的指揮官，安杰洛，好歹算是活了下來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 意大利人的指挥官，安杰洛，好歹算是活了下来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il leader dei soldati italiani, Angelo, era riuscito in qualche modo a sopravvivere.

Steam (ST): He encountered...nothing but the corpses of friend and foe.
Umineko Project (UP): He encountered......nothing but the corpses of friend and foe.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He encountered...nothing but the corpses of friend and foe.
PC Japanese (JP): 出くわすのは、……敵と、味方の、死体だけ。
Russian (RU): По дороге...... он сталкивался лишь с трупами друзей и врагов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele não encontrou nada......além dos cadáveres de seus amigos e inimigos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 一路上看見的，……不是敵人的屍體，就是己方的屍體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 一路上看见的，……不是敌人的尸体，就是己方的尸体。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non aveva incontrato altro... che cadaveri di amici e nemici.

Steam (ST): All was quiet once more in the base.
Umineko Project (UP): All was quiet once more in the base.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): All was quiet once more in the base.
PC Japanese (JP): 基地内はシンと静まりかえっている。
Russian (RU): На базе снова стало тихо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tudo estava silencioso na base novamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 基地內安靜到了，鴉雀無聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 基地内安静到了，鸦雀无声。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nella base, tutto tornò nuovamente alla tranquillità.

Steam (ST): If he was careless enough to call out, he might be shot from the shadows somewhere.
Umineko Project (UP): If he was careless enough to call out, he might be shot from the shadows somewhere.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If he was careless enough to call out, he might be shot from the shadows somewhere.
PC Japanese (JP): 迂闊に大声を出せば、物影から撃たれるかもしれない。
Russian (RU): Будь он достаточно беспечен, чтобы крикнуть, его могли бы застрелить из тени.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se ele fosse descuidado a ponto de gritar em voz alta, poderia acabar levando um tiro pelas sombras.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如去不加防備地大叫，就搞不好會被暗處射來的槍子打中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如去不加防备地大叫，就搞不好会被暗处射来的枪子打中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se fosse tanto sbadato da chiamare qualcuno, potrebbero sparargli da qualche parte nella tenebra.

Steam (ST): ...So, he snuck about like a panther, breathing quietly and searching for remaining enemies...
Umineko Project (UP): ......So, he snuck about like a panther, breathing quietly and searching for the remaining enemies...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……だからこうして息を殺しながら、残敵を探して、豹のように徘徊する…。
Russian (RU): ......Поэтому он крался как пантера, тихо выискивая оставшихся врагов...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Por isso, ele se esgueirou como uma pantera, com a respiração silenciosa, procurando pelos inimigos que restaram...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……所以他像這樣壓低了呼吸，搜索著殘敵，如豹子般徘徊…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……所以他像这样压低了呼吸，搜索着残敌，如豹子般徘徊…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perciò, si mosse furtivamente come una pantera, respirando piano e cercando il resto dei nemici...

Steam (ST): There was no sign or trace of any living person.
Umineko Project (UP): There was no sign or trace of any living person.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): There was no sign or trace of any living person.
PC Japanese (JP): 生きた者の姿も、気配も、何もない。
Russian (RU): Не было никаких признаков жизни.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não haviam sinais ou vestígios de pessoas vivas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 活人的身影也好，動靜也罷，什麼都沒有。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 活人的身影也好，动静也罢，什么都没有。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non c'era più alcuna traccia di persone vive.

Steam (ST): ...Maybe all of the people in this base had died.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Maybe all of the people in this base had died.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……この基地にいる全ての人間がもう、死に絶えたかもしれない。
Russian (RU): ......Быть может, на этой базе уже все умерли.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Talvez todas as pessoas da base tivessem morrido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這基地裡的所有人，也許已全部死絕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这基地里的所有人，也许已全部死绝。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Forse tutte le persone nella base erano morte.

Steam (ST): "...Damn Japanese...'
Umineko Project (UP): «......Damn Japanese......»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): '......Damn Japanese......'
PC Japanese (JP): “……日本人め、おのれ……。”
Russian (RU): «......Чёртовы японцы......»
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «......Malditos japoneses......»
Chinese Traditional (CHT): “……死日本人，可惡……”
Chinese Simplified (CN): “……死日本人，可恶……”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘... Maledetti giapponesi... ’

Steam (ST): The Japanese struck first, but at that time, we were also talking about killing them.
Umineko Project (UP): The Japanese struck first, but at that time, we were also talking about killing them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 日本人が先に仕掛けて来たが、あの時、我々もまた、日本人を殺すことを相談していた。
Russian (RU): Японцы ударили первыми, но тогда мы тоже говорили о том, чтобы убить их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os japoneses atacaram primeiro, mas, naquela hora, nós já estávamos falando sobre matá‐los.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然是日本人先動手的，但那時，我們也同樣是在商討著，去殺日本人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然是日本人先动手的，但那时，我们也同样是在商讨着，去杀日本人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Furono i giapponesi a colpire per primi, ma contemporaneamente, anche noi stavamo discutendo sul loro massacro.

Steam (ST): They simply made the first move as military men. So, perhaps we should be grateful for this day.
Umineko Project (UP): They simply made the first move as military men.{n}So, perhaps I should be grateful for today.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): They simply made the first move as military men. So, perhaps we should be grateful to them.
PC Japanese (JP): 彼らは軍人として、機先を制しただけのことだ。だから、とりあえず今日に、感謝することにした。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 彼らは軍人として、機先を制しただけのことだ。{n}だから、とりあえず今日に、感謝することにした。
Russian (RU): Они лишь сделали первый шаг, как военные.{n}Возможно, нам стоит поблагодарить их.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No papel de militares, eles simplesmente fizeram o primeiro movimento.{n}Então, talvez eu deva ser grato pelo dia de hoje.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他們只是作為軍人，搶了先機罷了。{n}所以，我姑且算是決定了，對今天這個日子，予以感謝。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他们只是作为军人，抢了先机罢了。{n}所以，我姑且算是决定了，对今天这个日子，予以感谢。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Hanno semplicemente fatto la prima mossa come militari. Quindi, forse dovremmo ringraziarli.

Steam (ST): Even if the boat had come to pick us up, there would've been no honor left for us.
Umineko Project (UP): Even if the boat had come to take us away, there would have been no honor for us.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By the time the boat came to take us away, there would have been no honor for us.
PC Japanese (JP): 迎えの船が来たところで、自分たちにはもう名誉など与えられはしない。
Russian (RU): Даже если бы судно приехало, нас бы не встретили с почётом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo se o barco viesse para nos buscar, não nos restaria mais honra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 哪怕接人的船來了，我們也已再也得不到榮譽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 哪怕接人的船来了，我们也已再也得不到荣誉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nel momento in cui la barca sarebbe venuta a portarci via, non ci sarebbe stato alcun onore per noi.

Steam (ST): We would've been mere failures in our mission, unfit to face our dead comrades.
Umineko Project (UP): We would have been mere failures in our mission, unfit to face our dead comrades.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We would have been mere failures in our mission, unfit to face our dead comrades.
PC Japanese (JP): 死んだ戦友たちに顔向け出来ない、哀れな任務失敗を思い知るだけ。
Russian (RU): Мы бы только осознали, что убого провалили миссию и не вправе стоять перед нашими погибшими товарищами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Seríamos meras falhas em nossa missão, inaptos a encarar nossos companheiros mortos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 僅僅是沒臉去見死去的戰友，深刻認識到可悲的任務失敗罷了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 仅仅是没脸去见死去的战友，深刻认识到可悲的任务失败罢了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Saremmo stati dei meri fallimenti per la nostra missione, incapaci di reggere lo sguardo dei nostri compagni morti.

Steam (ST): Perhaps dying here in the Far East alongside my gun...is a more fitting end for a soldier.
Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps dying here in the Far East alongside my gun......is a more fitting end for a soldier.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Perhaps dying here in the Far East alongside my gun......is a more fitting end for a soldier.
PC Japanese (JP): この極東の地で銃を抱いて死ねるのは、………軍人として本懐かもしれないのだ。
Russian (RU): Умереть здесь, на Дальнем Востоке, держа пистолет...... более достойный конец для солдата.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez morrer aqui, no Extremo Oriente, junto com a minha arma......seja o fim mais adequado para um soldado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 能在這遠東之地抱著槍死去，………也許倒也算是作為軍人的本願。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 能在这远东之地抱着枪死去，………也许倒也算是作为军人的本愿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse, morire qui, nell'Estremo Oriente, assieme alla mia pistola... è una fine più adatta per un soldato.

Steam (ST): I noticed the sound of shuffling feet coming from around the corner and strained to hear.
Umineko Project (UP): From around the corner, I noticed the sound of a leg being dragged along the ground, and I strained to hear.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I noticed the sound of shuffling feet coming from around the corner and strained to hear.
PC Japanese (JP): 曲がり角の向こうに、足を引き摺る音を聞き、耳をそばだてる。
Russian (RU): Я услышал шарканье из‐за угла и напряг слух.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Vindo de um dos cantos, eu notei um som de uma perna se arrastando pelo chão e foquei minha audição nela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從拐角的另一邊，傳來了腳拖在地上的聲音，我立馬豎起了耳朵。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从拐角的另一边，传来了脚拖在地上的声音，我立马竖起了耳朵。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Notai il rumore di piedi tremanti che veniva da dietro l'angolo e tesi le orecchie per ascoltare.

Steam (ST): ...Is someone seriously wounded and dragging their feet? Noticing them before they notice me greatly helps my chances.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Is someone seriously wounded and shuffling with a limp? Noticing them before they notice me greatly helps my chances.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Is someone seriously wounded and dragging their feet? Noticing them before they notice me greatly helps my chances.
PC Japanese (JP): ………負傷して、足を引き摺っているのか？　先に気配を気取れたのは、勝機。
Russian (RU): ......Кто‐то серьёзно ранен и волочит ноги? Удачно, что я заметил его до того, как он заметит меня.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Seria alguém seriamente ferido e se arrastando com as pernas? Notá‐lo antes dele me notar aumentou minhas chances.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………是負傷了，而拖著腳走路嗎？先被我聽到動靜，可謂勝機。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………是负伤了，而拖着脚走路吗？先被我听到动静，可谓胜机。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... È qualcuno ferito gravemente che trascina i suoi passi? Notarli prima che notino me aumenta di molto le mie possibilità.

Steam (ST): At this stage, there's no point in taking prisoners. We must dispose of all the Japanese.
Umineko Project (UP): At this stage, there's no point in taking prisoners.{n}We must dispose of all the Japanese.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At this stage, there's no point in taking prisoners. We must dispose of all the Japanese.
PC Japanese (JP): もうこの殺戮の段階において、捕虜を取る意味はない。むしろ、全ての日本人を排除すべきだ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): もうこの段階において、捕虜を取る意味はない。{n}むしろ、全ての日本人を排除すべきだ。
Russian (RU): Теперь уже нет смысла брать заложников.{n}Нужно избавиться от всех японцев.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A essa altura, não faz sentido manter prisioneiros.{n}Devemos eliminar todos os japoneses.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在這已至殺戮的階段，抓俘虜毫無意義。{n}不如說，應當去排除所有日本人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在这已至杀戮的阶段，抓俘虏毫无意义。{n}不如说，应当去排除所有日本人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A questo punto, non ha senso prendere dei prigionieri. Dobbiamo sbarazzarci di tutti i giapponesi.

Steam (ST): I'll dash around the corner, quickly check to see who they are, ...and shoot if it's a Japanese person. Nothing more.
Umineko Project (UP): I'll dash around the corner, quickly check to see who they are, ......and shoot if it's a Japanese person. Nothing more.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'll dash around the corner, quickly check to see who they are, ......and shoot if it's a Japanese person. Nothing more.
PC Japanese (JP): 曲がり角より飛び出して、素早く相手を確認し、……日本人だったら撃つ。それだけのことだ。
Russian (RU): Я забегу за угол, быстро проверю, кто там...... и выстрелю, если это японец. Ничего более.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu correrei até o canto, rapidamente olharei para ver quem é, ......e irei atirar se for japonês. Nada mais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 跳出拐角，迅速地掃視對方，……只要是個日本人，就立即開槍。僅此而已。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 跳出拐角，迅速地扫视对方，……只要是个日本人，就立即开枪。仅此而已。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Correrò dietro l'angolo, controllerò alla svelta per vedere chi è... e sparerò se è giapponese. Nient'altro.

Steam (ST): I've been hiding my footsteps the whole time. They probably don't know I'm here.
Umineko Project (UP): I've been hiding my footsteps the whole time. They probably don't know I'm here.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I've been hiding my footsteps the whole time. They probably don't know I'm here.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分はずっと足音を殺していた。こちらは気取られていないはず。
Russian (RU): Я всё время шёл бесшумно. Вряд ли он знает, что я здесь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu estive ocultando meus passos o tempo inteiro. Provavelmente não sabem que eu estou aqui.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我一直都有注意不發出腳步聲。對方應該沒注意到我。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我一直都有注意不发出脚步声。对方应该没注意到我。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Finora ho nascosto i miei passi. Non dovrebbe sapere che mi trovo qui.

Steam (ST): Once the shuffling footsteps had come close enough, Angelo leaned around the corner and raised his gun.
Umineko Project (UP): Once the shuffling footsteps had come close enough, Angelo leaned around the corner and raised his gun.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Once the shuffling footsteps had come close enough, Angelo leaned around the corner and raised his gun.
PC Japanese (JP): 引き摺る足音が、充分な間合いまで近付いてきてから、アンジェロは身を乗り出し、銃を構える。
Russian (RU): Как только шаркающие шаги подошли достаточно близко, Анджело прислонился к углу и поднял пистолет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando os vacilantes passos se aproximaram, Angelo inclinou‐se no canto do corredor e ergueu sua arma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 當拖著腳走路的腳步聲，靠近到足夠發動攻擊的距離後，安杰洛探出身子，舉起槍口。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 当拖着脚走路的脚步声，靠近到足够发动攻击的距离后，安杰洛探出身子，举起枪口。

Steam (ST): The voice that reached him...spoke Italian.
Umineko Project (UP): The voice that reached him...spoke Italian.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The voice that reached him...spoke Italian.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 迎接這樣的他的，是一聲意大利語。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 迎接这样的他的，是一声意大利语。

Speaker: Beatrice

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): "Heheheh, I've been looking for you, Lieutenant Angelo... That makes all of you. I've been counting Italian corpses, you see...!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Heheheh, I've been looking for you, Ensign Angelo... That makes all of you. I've been counting Italian corpses, you see...!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「くっくっく、貴様を探していたぞ、アンジェロ少尉…。これで全員だな。俺はしっかり、貴様らイタ公の死体を数えて回ってたんだからな…！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「くっくっく、貴様を探していたぞ、アンジェロ少尉…。これで全員だな。俺はしっかり、貴様らの死体を数えて回ってたんだからな…！！」
Russian (RU): "Хе‐хе‐хех, я тебя искал, прапорщик Анджело... Теперь с вами покончено. Знаешь, я считал трупы итальянцев!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Heheheh, eu estive procurando por você, subtenente Angelo... Com isso, são todos. Eu estive contando os cadáveres italianos, sabia...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「呵呵呵，我正找你這傢伙呢，安杰洛少尉…。這下是全齊了。畢竟，我可是仔細數著你們這幫意大利佬的屍體地兜了一圈啊…！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呵呵呵，我正找你这家伙呢，安杰洛少尉…。这下是全齐了。毕竟，我可是仔细数着你们这帮意大利佬的尸体地兜了一圈啊…！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Heheheh, ti stavo cercando, Alfiere Angelo... con te sono finiti. Vedi, stavo contando i cadaveri italiani...!!"

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "L-Lieutenant Angelo!! Are you okay?!'
Umineko Project (UP): «No, don't die!! Ensign Angelo!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'E, Ensign Angelo!! Are you okay?!'

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): «Não, não morra!! Subtenente Angelo!»

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘A-Alfiere Angelo!! Stai bene?!’

Steam (ST): Blood poured from Angelo's chest, ...his gun fell to the floor, then his knees, and then the rest of his body crumpled... and stopped moving.
Umineko Project (UP): Blood poured from Angelo's chest, ......his gun fell to the floor, then his knees, and then the rest of his body crumpled......and stopped moving.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): アンジェロは胸から、こぽりと血が溢れ出し、……銃を落とす音、膝を落とす音に続き、どさりと床に崩れ落ちる音を聞かせ、……動かなくなった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): アンジェロは胸から、こぽりと血が溢れ出し、……銃を落とす音、膝を落とす音に続き、どさりと床に崩れ落ちる音を聞かせ、……動かなくなった。
Russian (RU): Из груди Анджело полилась кровь...... пистолет упал на пол, после чего он рухнул на колени, упал...... и перестал двигаться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sangue verteu do peito de Angelo, ......sua arma caiu no chão, em seguida seus joelhos, e seu torço colapsou......parando de se mover.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從安杰洛的胸口，咕嘟咕嘟地溢出鮮血，……槍落地的聲音，緊接著，是膝蓋著地的聲音，等發出“撲通”一聲，癱倒在地上的聲音後，……他就再也不動了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从安杰洛的胸口，咕嘟咕嘟地溢出鲜血，……枪落地的声音，紧接着，是膝盖着地的声音，等发出“扑通”一声，瘫倒在地上的声音后，……他就再也不动了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il sangue scorse dal petto di Angelo... la sua pistola cadde sul pavimento, poi le sue ginocchia, e in seguito crollò il resto del suo corpo... e smise di muoversi.

Steam (ST): Yamamoto's accuracy with a gun wasn't particularly stellar.
Umineko Project (UP): Yamamoto's accuracy with a gun wasn't particularly stellar.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Yamamoto's accuracy with a gun wasn't particularly stellar.
PC Japanese (JP): 山本の銃の腕は決していい方ではない。
Russian (RU): Ямамото стрелял не очень точно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A precisão de Yamamoto com armas não era nada de extraordinária.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 山本的槍法，絕對稱不上好。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 山本的枪法，绝对称不上好。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La precisione di Yamamoto con una pistola non era particolarmente buona.

Steam (ST): However, Angelo had waited until they were fairly close before jumping out, so Yamamoto had made the shot.
Umineko Project (UP): However, Angelo had waited until they were fairly close before jumping out, so Yamamoto had been able to hit his target.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, Angelo had waited until they were fairly close before jumping out, so Yamamoto had made the shot.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、アンジェロが充分に間合いを詰めてから飛び出してくれたので、当てることが出来た。
Russian (RU): Но Анджело ждал, пока они окажутся достаточно близко, прежде чем выскочить, и поэтому тот попал.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, Angelo havia esperado até eles estarem bem próximos para poder aparecer, assim Yamamoto foi capaz de atingir seu alvo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，由於安杰洛是等到足夠近的距離後才跳出來的，所以他能一槍命中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，由于安杰洛是等到足够近的距离后才跳出来的，所以他能一枪命中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, Angelo aveva aspettato che fossero vicini prima di balzare fuori, perciò venne colpito da Yamamoto.

Steam (ST): He had managed to hit, even with a short-barreled handgun in one hand...and a woman as a hostage in the other.
Umineko Project (UP): And he had managed it with a short‐barreled handgun in one hand......and a woman as a hostage in the other.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He had managed to hit, even with a short-barreled handgun in one hand......and a woman as a hostage in the other.
PC Japanese (JP): 銃身の短い拳銃を片手で構え、……女を人質に取りながらでも、当てることが出来た。
Russian (RU): Он сумел ударить даже с короткоствольным пистолетом в одной руке... и заложницей в другой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sendo capaz de fazer isso com uma pistola de cano curto em uma mão......e uma mulher de refém na outra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 哪怕是單手舉著槍身很短的手槍，……抓著個女人當人質，也能一槍命中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 哪怕是单手举着枪身很短的手枪，……抓着个女人当人质，也能一枪命中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era riuscito a colpire, persino con una pistola a canna corta in una mano... e una donna come ostaggio nell'altra.

Steam (ST): "Really, though, our Rokkenjima garrison was pathetic! Am I the only one who's not dead?! Trash, all of them!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Really, though, our Rokkenjima garrison was pathetic! Am I the only one who's not dead?! Trash, all of them!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「それにしても、我が六軒島守備隊の情けないことよ！　まさか私以外は全員死んだのではあるまいな？！　やれやれクズどもめ！」
Russian (RU): "И всё‐таки, до чего же наш гарнизон был жалок! Я что, единственный, кто не умер?! Вот ничтожества!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sério, a guarnição da nossa Rokkenjima é patética! Eu sou o único que não morreu?! Lixo, todos eles!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「說起來，我的六軒島守備隊，可真夠不像樣！總不會除我以外全都死了吧？！哎呀哎呀，好一幫廢柴！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说起来，我的六轩岛守备队，可真够不像样！总不会除我以外全都死了吧？！哎呀哎呀，好一帮废柴！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Però, la nostra guarnigione su Rokkenjima era davvero patetica! Sono l'unico ad essere sopravvissuto?! Sono dei rifiuti, tutti quanti!"

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "Can't you fight without using a woman as a shield, you brute?!! Let go!'
Umineko Project (UP): «Can't you fight without using a woman as a shield, you brute?!! Let go!»
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'Can't you fight without using a woman as a shield, you brute?!! Let go!'

Chinese Simplified (CN): “不拿女人当盾牌就不敢打，你不是人！！放开我！”
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Che bruto, non puoi combattere senza usare una donna come scudo?!! Lasciami andare!’

Steam (ST): "Quiet! Noisy, these Italian girls. If you'd just be cooperative, I'd at least spare your life. Heheheh!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Quiet! Noisy, these Italian girls. If you'd just be cooperative, I'd at least spare your life. Heheheh!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「静かにしろ！　イタリア女は実に騒がしい。大人しくしてれば、命までは取らんというのにッ。くっくっく！」
Russian (RU): "Замолчи! Эти итальянки такие шумные. Если будешь сотрудничать, я пощажу тебя. Хе‐хе‐хех!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Quieta! Essas italianas são mesmo barulhentas. Se ao menos cooperasse, eu poderia poupar a sua vida. Heheheh!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「安靜點！意大利婆娘實在是，好吵啊。明明只要老實點，就不會要你的命了。呵呵呵！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「安静点！意大利婆娘实在是，好吵啊。明明只要老实点，就不会要你的命了。呵呵呵！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Zitta! Chiassose, queste ragazze italiane. Se solo fossi cooperativa, almeno risparmierei la tua vita. Heheheh!"

Steam (ST): It was such an obvious lie that even he wore a bitter smile.
Umineko Project (UP): It was such an obvious lie that even he wore a bitter smile.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): それは、彼自身が苦笑いしてしまうほどの嘘だ。
Russian (RU): Эта ложь была такой очевидной, что даже он горько улыбнулся.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi uma mentira tão óbvia que até ele mesmo exibiu um sorriso amargo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這是個，假到他自己都會發出苦笑的謊言。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这是个，假到他自己都会发出苦笑的谎言。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era una menzogna tanto ovvia che persino lui aveva sul volto un sorriso amaro.

Steam (ST): The Italians were spies working for the enemy, and they all died along with the garrison in a gunfight.
Umineko Project (UP): "The Italians were spies working for the enemy, and they all died along with the garrison in a gunfight".
Original Witch Hunt (OG): 'The Italians were spies working for the enemy, and they all died along with the garrison in a gunfight'.
PC Japanese (JP): イタリア人たちは敵に内通したスパイで、銃撃戦になり、守備隊共々全滅した。
Russian (RU): Итальянцы оказались шпионами, работающими на врага, и все они вместе с гарнизоном погибли в перестрелке.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Os italianos eram espiões trabalhando para o inimigo, e todos morreram com a guarnição em um tiroteio".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 意大利人是內通外敵的間諜，隨後發生槍戰，與守備隊一同全滅。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 意大利人是内通外敌的间谍，随后发生枪战，与守备队一同全灭。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ‘Gli italiani erano delle spie che lavoravano per il nemico, e sono tutti morti assieme alla guarnigione in una sparatoria’.

Steam (ST): Since this was the story Yamamoto wanted to tell, he couldn't afford to have any Italian survivors.
Umineko Project (UP): That was the story Yamamoto wanted to tell, and so he couldn't afford to have any Italian survivors.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since this was the story Yamamoto wanted to tell, he couldn't afford to have any Italian survivors.
PC Japanese (JP): そういう筋書きにしたい山本にとって、イタリア人生存者は不都合なのだ。
Russian (RU): Если Ямамото хочет рассказать такую историю, выжившие итальянцы недопустимы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa era a história que Yamamoto queria contar, por isso ele não podia permitir que nenhum italiano sobrevivesse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對於想以這種劇本來收場的山本來說，意大利倖存者將會壞事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 对于想以这种剧本来收场的山本来说，意大利幸存者将会坏事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poiché era questa la storia che Yamamoto voleva raccontare, non poteva permettersi di lasciare dei sopravvissuti italiani.

Steam (ST): By this point, he wouldn't be able to keep the entire pile of gold, but he should be able to grab as many as he could carry. Even that would be worth a huge amount of money.
Umineko Project (UP): At this point, he wouldn't be able to keep the entire pile of gold, but he could at least grab as many ingots as he could carry. Even that would be worth a huge amount of money.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): By this point, he wouldn't be able to keep the entire pile of gold, but he should be able to grab as many as he could carry. Even that would be worth a huge amount of money.
PC Japanese (JP): もはや黄金の山を丸ごと手に入れることは出来ないが、自分で持ち運べる程度の、インゴット数本をくすねることは出来るはず。そしてそれだけでも、十分な大金になるはず。
Russian (RU): Теперь он уже не в состоянии забрать всю груду золота, но может схватить столько, сколько сможет унести. Даже это будет стоить огромной денежной суммы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquela altura, ele não seria capaz de manter todo o ouro para si, mas ainda poderia pegar quantos lingotes conseguisse carregar. Mesmo isso já seria equivalente a uma fortuna em dinheiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖已無法將整座金山收入囊中，但應該能把以一己之力就能帶走的那幾塊給悄悄偷走。並且，光憑這幾塊，應該就能成為十足的大富豪了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽已无法将整座金山收入囊中，但应该能把以一己之力就能带走的那几块给悄悄偷走。并且，光凭这几块，应该就能成为十足的大富豪了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A quel punto, non sarebbe riuscito a tenere per sé l'intera montagna d'oro, ma dovrebbe riuscire a rubare tutti i lingotti che poteva portare con sé. Perfino quella sarebbe stata un'ingente quantità di denaro.

Steam (ST): Beatrice suddenly swung her head, smashing Yamamoto's nose hard.
Umineko Project (UP): Beatrice suddenly swung her head, smashing Yamamoto's nose hard.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beatrice suddenly swung her head, smashing Yamamoto's nose hard.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトリーチェが、いきなり頭を大きく反らす。それは思いきり山本の鼻筋を打ちのめした。
Russian (RU): Беатриче вдруг махнула головой, с треском разбив Ямамото нос.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Beatrice sacudiu a cabeça repentinamente, esmagando com força o nariz de Yamamoto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 貝阿朵莉切突然把頭往後一仰。她的後腦勺，扎扎實實地砸扁了山本的鼻梁。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 贝阿朵莉切突然把头往后一仰。她的后脑勺，扎扎实实地砸扁了山本的鼻梁。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Beatrice mosse improvvisamente la sua testa, colpendo violentemente il naso di Yamamoto.

Umineko Project (UP): She almost managed to escape. However, Yamamoto quickly grabbed her leg and tripped her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 頭突きの隙にうまく逃れるはずだった。しかし山本は素早く彼女の足を引っ掛けて転ばせたのだ。
Russian (RU): Ей почти удалось сбежать. Однако Ямамото быстро схватил её за ногу, заставив споткнуться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela quase conseguiu escapar. Porém, Yamamoto rapidamente agarrou sua perna e ela tropeçou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 趁著後腦勺那一砸的空當，她本應能順利逃脫。然而事實卻是，山本眼疾手快地抓住她的腳，一把將她拉倒在地。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 趁着后脑勺那一砸的空当，她本应能顺利逃脱。然而事实却是，山本眼疾手快地抓住她的脚，一把将她拉倒在地。

Steam (ST): She fell onto her back, and Yamamoto mercilessly stomped his foot down on her stomach and pointed his gun at her.
Umineko Project (UP): She fell onto her back, and Yamamoto mercilessly stomped his foot down on her stomach and pointed his gun at her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She fell onto her back, and Yamamoto mercilessly stomped his foot down on her stomach and pointed his gun at her.
PC Japanese (JP): 転んで仰向けになった彼女の腹を、山本は容赦なく踏みつけて、銃を構える。
Russian (RU): Она упала на спину, и он безжалостно надавил ногой ей на живот, наставив на неё пистолет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela caiu de costas, e Yamamoto impiedosamente pisou com seu pé no estômago de Beatrice e apontou sua arma para ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 對準倒地仰面朝天的她的腹部，山本毫不留情地踩了下去，拿槍指著貝阿朵莉切。

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あぁん？　銃を上官に向けるとはどういうつもりか。……頭を冷やせ、愚か者め。私とお前で口裏を合わせれば、あの黄金の山は私たちだけのものではないか。……私一人では少々をくすねるくらいしか出来んが、お前と二人でなら、もっと多くの数をくすねることが出来る。……上官面をするつもりはないぞ。男同士、二人できっちり山分けしようじゃないか」
Russian (RU): "А? Наставляешь пистолет на вышестоящего офицера?......Освежи голову, идиот. Договорившись придерживаться одной истории, мы сможем присвоить себе всю эту гору золота. ......Я могу забрать немного, но вместе мы унесём гораздо больше. ......Я говорю не как твой начальник. Давай разделим его между собой как мужчины."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hã? Está apontando sua arma para um superior? ......Pare e pense, seu idiota. Vamos dividir entre nós, como homens."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「昂——？把槍指著長官，你這算什麼意思？……去冷靜下頭腦吧，蠢貨。只要我與你對好口風，這座金山不就只屬於我們了嘛？……雖然我一人只能稍微偷出個一點點，但我與你兩人的話，就能偷出更多的黃金。……我沒有用長官身份壓你的意思。咱們就作為男人，哥倆好地將之平分了吧。」

Io potrei prenderne qualche lingotto solo per me, ma se lavoriamo insieme, possiamo rubarne ancora di più. ... Non lo sto dicendo come tuo superiore. Dividiamocelo come individui."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "<I need to take you to a hospital. ...The wound might be more serious than you realize.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<I need to take you to a hospital. ......The wound might be more serious than you realize.>"

Umineko Project (UP): "<......That's interesting. Never knew there was a hospital on this island.>"

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『ない。隣の島へ船で運ぶ。……君は病院へ。私は、この島での出来事をうまく片付けないと、……とばっちりで軍法会議ものだ』

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Não tem. Vou usar um barco e levá‐la para a próxima ilha. ......Vou levá‐la a um hospital, mas eu preciso voltar aqui e limpar a bagunça nessa ilha, ......ou vai acabar na corte marcial.›"

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Non c'è. Userò una barca per portarti all'isola più vicina. ... In un ospedale. {n}Se non ripuliamo il casino su quest'isola... ci toccherà stare davanti alla corte marziale. {p:0:＞}"

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<If we go to a hospital and the embassy is contacted, I'll eventually be sent back to Italy. ...If that happens, I'll be interrogated about all kinds of things. I won't acknowledge the bastards who let Mama die.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<If we go to a hospital and the embassy is contacted, I'll eventually be sent back to Italy. ......If that happens, I'll be interrogated about all kinds of things. I won't acknowledge those people, who let Mama die.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "<If we go to a hospital and the embassy is contacted, I'll eventually be sent back to Italy. ......If that happens, I'll be interrogated about all kinds of things. I won't acknowledge the bastards who let Mama die.>"
PC Japanese (JP): 『病院へ行って、大使館に連絡が行けば、私はやがて本国へ送還されるわ。……そしてきっと、あれこれと尋問を受けるんだわ。私は、ママを見殺しにしたヤツらを、自分の祖国とは認めないの。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『病院へ行って、大使館に連絡が行けば、私はやがて本国へ送還されるわ。……そしてきっと、あれこれと尋問を受けるんだわ。私は、ママを見殺しにしたヤツらを、自分の祖国とは認めないの』
Russian (RU): "<Если мы поедем в больницу и свяжутся с посольством, меня в конечном итоге отправят обратно в Италию. ......И тогда станут допрашивать о всевозможных вещах. Я не признаю тех, кто оставил маму умирать.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Se formos para um hospital e a embaixada entrar em contato, eventualmente eu serei mandada de volta para a Itália. ......Se isso acontecer, eu serei interrogada sobre todo o tipo de coisa. Eu não reconheço aquelas pessoas que deixaram a mamãe morrer.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『一旦去了醫院，聯繫了大使館，我就終將會被送回本國。……然後，我一定會被他們質問這質問那的。我可不承認，那幫對我媽媽見死不救的傢伙，是我的祖國。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『一旦去了医院，联系了大使馆，我就终将会被送回本国。……然后，我一定会被他们质问这质问那的。我可不承认，那帮对我妈妈见死不救的家伙，是我的祖国。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Se andiamo in un ospedale e contattano l'ambasciata, alla fine mi rispediranno in Italia. ... Se succederà questo, mi interrogheranno su un sacco di cose. Io non riconoscerò i bastardi che hanno lasciato che Mamma morisse. {p:0:＞}"

Speaker: Beatrice

Umineko Project (UP): "<There's no homeland for me to return to now. This is the end for me. So, there's nowhere I want to go anymore. ......The people who were so kind to me—Ensign Angelo, Rubens, and everyone else, ......they're all dead.>"

PC Japanese (JP): 『もう、私の帰るべき祖国はないの。ここが私の終点。だからもう、私はどこへも行きたくないの。……私にやさしくしてくれたアンジェロ少尉も、ルーベンスも、みんなみんな、……死んでしまった。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『もう、私の帰るべき祖国はないの。ここが私の終点。だからもう、私はどこへも行きたくないの。……私にやさしくしてくれたアンジェロ少尉も、ルーベンスも、みんなみんな、……死んでしまった』
Russian (RU): "<Теперь у меня нет родины, чтобы туда возвращаться. Для меня всё кончено. Поэтому я больше никуда не хочу. ......Прапорщик Анджело, Рубенс, все те, кто был так добр ко мне, ......погибли.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Não existe pátria para eu retornar agora. Não existe fim para mim. Por isso, eu não posso ir para lugar nenhum. ......As pessoas que foram tão gentis comigo — o subtenente Angelo, o Rubens e todos os outros, ......eles estão todos mortos.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『我已經沒有，能回去的祖國了。這裡就是我的終點。所以，我已經不想去任何地方了。……對我很好的安杰洛少尉、魯本斯、大家大家，……全都死了。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『我已经没有，能回去的祖国了。这里就是我的终点。所以，我已经不想去任何地方了。……对我很好的安杰洛少尉、鲁本斯、大家大家，……全都死了。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Ora non ho più una madrepatria in cui tornare. Per me, questa è la fine. Perciò, non voglio andare più da nessuna parte. ... L'alfiere Angelo, Rubens, tutti quelli che sono stati così gentili con me... sono tutti morti. {p:0:＞}"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "<And because of that, you want to die here too? I thought you said Italian women weren't weak. Live.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<And because of that, you want to die here too? I thought you said Italian women weren't weak. Live.>"

Russian (RU): "<И поэтому ты тоже хочешь здесь умереть? Ты же говорила, что итальянки не слабые. Живи.>"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 『所以，你也要在这儿死吗？意大利女人可并不娇弱吧？活下去。』

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<Hey, Kinzo? What does it mean...to live? You're the one who taught me, aren't you? Living is more than just breathing. ...I don't want to go back to Italy.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<Hey, Kinzo? What does it mean...to live? You're the one who taught me, aren't you? Living is more than just breathing. .........I don't want to go back to Italy.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "<Hey, Kinzo? What does it mean...to live? You're the one who taught me, aren't you? Living is more than just breathing. ......I don't want to go back to Italy.>"
PC Japanese (JP): 『ねぇ、金蔵。生きるってどういう意味？　あなたが教えてくれたはずよ。生きるってのは、ただ息をすることじゃないわ。………私は、イタリアへ帰りたくないの。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『ねぇ、金蔵。生きるってどういう意味？　あなたが教えてくれたはずよ。生きるってのは、ただ息をすることじゃないわ。………私は、イタリアへ帰りたくないの』
Russian (RU): "<Эй, Кинзо. Что значит... жить? Разве не ты объяснил мне? Жить означает не только дышать. ......Я не хочу возвращаться в Италию.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Ei, Kinzo? O que significa...viver? Foi você quem me ensinou, não foi? Viver é mais do que apenas respirar. .........Eu não quero voltar à Itália.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『喂，金藏。所謂活著，是怎麼個意思呢？你應該有教給過我喲。活著，並非僅僅是指在呼吸。………我，不想回意大利。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『喂，金藏。所谓活着，是怎么个意思呢？你应该有教给过我哟。活着，并非仅仅是指在呼吸。………我，不想回意大利。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Ehi, Kinzo? Cosa significa... vivere? Sei stato tu ad insegnarmelo, giusto? Vivere è più che respirare. ... Non voglio tornare in Italia. {p:0:＞}"

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<You said that you were dead until you met me. But it's the same for me. ...I died in that submarine. My homeland fell, Mama died. Even Papa died.
Umineko Project (UP): "<You've said that you were dead before you met me. But it's the same for me. ......I died in that submarine. My homeland fell, Mama died. Even Papa died.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "<You've said that you were dead until you met me. But it's the same for me. ......I died in that submarine. My homeland fell, Mama died. Even Papa died.
PC Japanese (JP): 『あなたは私と出会うまで、死んでいたと言ってくれたわ。でも、それは私も同じなの。……潜水艦の中で、私は死んでいた。祖国も滅び、ママも死んだ。パパもね。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『あなたは私と出会うまで、死んでいたと言ってくれたわ。でも、それは私も同じなの。……潜水艦の中で、私は死んでいた。祖国も滅び、ママも死んだ。パパもね』
Russian (RU): "<Ты сказал, что до встречи со мной был мёртв. Но я тоже. ......Я умерла в той субмарине. Моя родина пала, мама умерла. Даже папа умер.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Você disse que estava morto antes de me encontrar. Mas eu também estava. ......Eu morri naquele submarino. Minha pátria caiu, a mamãe morreu. Até o papai morreu.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『你曾對我說過，在遇到我之前，你是個死人。然而，這點我也一樣。……在潛水艇中時，我是個死人。祖國滅亡，媽媽也死了。爸爸也死了。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『你曾对我说过，在遇到我之前，你是个死人。然而，这点我也一样。……在潜水艇中时，我是个死人。祖国灭亡，妈妈也死了。爸爸也死了。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Hai detto che eri morto prima che mi incontrassi. Ma è lo stesso per me. {n}Io sono morta in quel sottomarino. La mia madrepatria è caduta, Mamma è morta. Così come Papà.

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): ...I prayed that our sub would just sink to the bottom of the ocean. So, when we reached this place, I was actually disappointed that we'd survived. ...Then, right after that, Lieutenant Angelo started asking whether anyone could speak English.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<......I prayed that our sub would just sink to the bottom of the ocean. So, when we reached this place, I was actually disappointed that we'd survived. .........Then, right after that, Ensign Angelo started asking whether anyone could speak English.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I prayed that our sub would just sink to the bottom of the ocean. So, when we reached this place, I was actually disappointed that we'd survived. ......Then, right after that, Ensign Angelo started asking whether anyone could speak English.>"
PC Japanese (JP): ……私は、こんな船、沈んでしまえと願ったわ。だから、ここに辿り着いた時、実は死に損ねたとがっかりした。………その矢先よ。少尉が、英語がわかる者はいるかと騒ぎ出したのは。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『……私は、こんな船、沈んでしまえと願ったわ。だから、ここに辿り着いた時、実は死に損ねたとがっかりした。………その矢先よ。少尉が、英語がわかる者はいるかと騒ぎ出したのは』
Russian (RU): "<......Я пожелала, чтобы наша субмарина опустилась на дно океана. Когда мы прибыли сюда, на самом деле я была разочарована тем, что мы выжили. ......И сразу после этого прапорщик Анджело начал искать того, кто знает английский.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹......Eu rezei para que o nosso submarino afundasse no oceano. Por isso, quando chegamos aqui, eu fiquei desapontada por termos sobrevivido. .........Então, logo depois, o subtenente Angelo começou a perguntar se alguém podia falar inglês.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『……我在心中祈願著，這船沉了得了。所以，在抵達此地時，我其實曾對沒能死成很是失望。………就是在這個時候喲。少尉吵吵著問，有沒有懂英語的人。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『……我在心中祈愿着，这船沉了得了。所以，在抵达此地时，我其实曾对没能死成很是失望。………就是在这个时候哟。少尉吵吵着问，有没有懂英语的人。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ho pregato che il nostro sottomarino affondasse nel fondo dell'oceano. Perciò, quando abbiamo raggiunto questo posto, in realtà ero delusa del fatto che fossimo sopravvissuti. ... Poi, subito dopo, l'alfiere Angelo ha iniziato a chiedere se qualcuno parlasse inglese. {p:0:＞}"

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<Now that I've lost my homeland, my family, and my friends, ...my only wish... is for you to kidnap me and take me away with you.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<I... ......Now that I've lost my homeland, my family, and my friends, ............I wish you would whisk me away.>"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "<I......now that I've lost my homeland, my family, my friends, ......I wish you would kidnap me.>"
PC Japanese (JP): 『私は。……祖国も家族も友人たちも失った私を、…………あなたにさらって欲しいと願うの。』

Speaker: Beatrice
Steam (ST): "<But...I know that's a wish that couldn't possibly come true. ...So, at the very least, I want to be with you until the boat comes for us. I don't care about the pain in my chest. After all, when the boat comes and takes me away, ...I'll die.>"
Umineko Project (UP): "<But, ......I know that's a wish that couldn't come true. ......So, at the very least, ......I want to be with you until the boat comes for us. I don't care about the pain in my chest. After all, when the boat comes and takes me away, ......I'll die.>"

PC Japanese (JP): 『でも、……それは叶えられない望みだともわかってる。……ならばせめて。……迎えの船が来るまでの数日間を、あなたと一緒にいたいの。胸の痛みなんて、気にしない。だって、迎えの船に連れ去られたら、……私はもう、死んでしまうのだから。』
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 『でも、……それは叶えられない望みだともわかってる。……ならばせめて。……迎えの船が来るまでの数日間を、あなたと一緒にいたいの。胸の痛みなんて、気にしない。だって、迎えの船に連れ去られたら、……私はもう、死んでしまうのだから』
Russian (RU): "<Но... я знаю, что этому желанию не суждено сбыться. ......Поэтому я хочу хотя бы быть с тобой, пока за нами не приедут. Меня не волнует боль в груди. Ведь когда судно прибудет и заберёт меня...... я уже буду мертва.>"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "‹Mas ......eu sei que esse desejo não pode se realizar. ......Por isso, ao menos, ......eu quero ficar com você até o barco vir nos buscar. Eu não me importo com a dor no meu peito. Afinal, quando o barco vir e me levar embora, ......eu morrerei.›"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 『但是，……我也明白，這是個無法實現的願望。……那麼至少。……在接送船到來之前的數天內，我想和你在一起。我毫不在意，胸口的痛楚。畢竟，一旦被接送的船帶走，……我就會死去。』
Chinese Simplified (CN): 『但是，……我也明白，这是个无法实现的愿望。……那么至少。……在接送船到来之前的数天内，我想和你在一起。我毫不在意，胸口的痛楚。毕竟，一旦被接送的船带走，……我就会死去。』
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "{p:0:＜}Però... so che è un desiderio inesaudibile. ... Perciò, perlomeno, voglio stare con te finché non arriverà la nave. Non m'importa del dolore al petto. Dopotutto, una volta che arriverà la barca e mi porterà via... io morirò. {p:0:＞}"
